original: rang gi gnas de nas mchog gi cha srog gi nus pas khyim gyi 'khor lo ste /
analyzed: rang gi gnas de nas mchog gi cha srog gi nus pas khyim gyi 'khor lo ste /
translated: From one's own place, the supreme part, the power of life, is the wheel of the house.

original: rtsa'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa dkyil 'khor drug cu'i bdag nyid can 'dod te /
analyzed: rtsa'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa dkyil 'khor drug cu'i bdag nyid can 'dod te /
translated: The twelve spokes of the cakra of the nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s are asserted to be the nature of sixty ma·πá·∏çalas.

original: nyams dang lhag ma mtshungs pa yi //
analyzed: nyams dang lhag ma mtshungs pa yi //
translated: The degeneration and the remainder are the same.

original: zhes pa la nyams pa ni rgyu ba'i nyin zhag rnams te /
analyzed: zhes pa la nyams pa ni rgyu ba'i nyin zhag rnams te /
translated: ‚ÄúDegeneration‚Äù refers to the moving days.

original: lnga dang / bcu dang / bco lnga dang / nyi shu dang / nyi shu rtsa lnga dang / nyi shu rtsa drug dang / nyi shu rtsa bdun ni nyams pa'o //
analyzed: lnga dang / bcu dang / bco lnga dang / nyi shu dang / nyi shu rtsa lnga dang / nyi shu rtsa drug dang / nyi shu rtsa bdun ni nyams pa'o //
translated: Five, ten, fifteen, twenty, twenty-five, twenty-six, and twenty-seven are degeneration.

original: lhag ma ni lo gsum dang / lo gnyis dang / lo gcig dang / zla ba drug dang / zla ba gsum dang / zla ba gnyis dang / zla ba gcig ni nyams pa'i lhag ma ste /
analyzed: lhag ma ni lo gsum dang / lo gnyis dang / lo gcig dang / zla ba drug dang / zla ba gsum dang / zla ba gnyis dang / zla ba gcig ni nyams pa'i lhag ma ste /
translated: The remainder is three years, two years, one year, six months, three months, two months, and one month.

original: nyams pa'i lhag ma de dag rnams kyis 'dab ma dang po la sogs pa nas ji srid rtsa'i 'dab ma bdun pa'i bar de srid du rim pas lo dang zla ba ste /
analyzed: nyams pa'i lhag ma de dag rnams kyis 'dab ma dang po la sogs pa nas ji srid rtsa'i 'dab ma bdun pa'i bar de srid du rim pas lo dang zla ba ste /
translated: Those degenerations and the remainder are the years and months, respectively, from the first petal up to the seventh petal of the nƒÅ·∏çƒ´.

original: lo gsum @249b mig ri bong can gyis rtsa gsum 'dor ro //
analyzed: lo gsum @249b mig ri bong can gyis rtsa gsum 'dor ro //
translated: The three years, three months, and fifteen days are subtracted from the three nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s.

original: zla ba drug gsum zung dang zla ba rnams kyis rtsa bdun 'dor ro //
analyzed: zla ba drug gsum zung dang zla ba rnams kyis rtsa bdun 'dor ro //
translated: The six months, three months, and the pairs of months subtract seven nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s.

original: zhag gis kyang rdzogs pa nas ni lhag ma mtshungs pa'i zhes pa la rdzogs pa'i dus ni skye ba'i gnas kyi mtshams nas bdun pa ste nyi ma dang rdul nub pa'i dus so //
analyzed: zhag gis kyang rdzogs pa nas ni lhag ma mtshungs pa'i zhes pa la rdzogs pa'i dus ni skye ba'i gnas kyi mtshams nas bdun pa ste nyi ma dang rdul nub pa'i dus so //
translated: The remaining equal days are from the time of completion. The time of completion is the seventh from the juncture of birth, the time of the setting of the sun and the dust.

original: rdzogs pa'i dus de nas srog gi nus pa rgyu ba'i tshe'i nyin zhag mtshungs pa rnams kyis khyim gyi rtsa yongs su 'dor te /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i dus de nas srog gi nus pa rgyu ba'i tshe'i nyin zhag mtshungs pa rnams kyis khyim gyi rtsa yongs su 'dor te /
translated: From that time of completion, the remaining equal days of the life-supporting vƒÅyu move, completely subtracting the nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s of the houses.

original: tshes nyin zhag bco lnga dang / phyogs nyin zhag bcu dang / mda' nyin zhag lnga dang / yon tan zhes pa nyin zhag gsum ste /
analyzed: tshes nyin zhag bco lnga dang / phyogs nyin zhag bcu dang / mda' nyin zhag lnga dang / yon tan zhes pa nyin zhag gsum ste /
translated: Fifteen days of the lunar mansions, ten days of the directions, five days of the arrows, and three days of the qualities.

original: nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum po 'di rnams kyis rtsa brgyad pa dang / dgu pa dang / bcu pa dang / khyim gyi rtsa bcu gcig pa dkyil 'khor lnga 'bab par byed pa ni nyi ma'i rab tu rgyu bas 'dor te rtsa g-yas pa gcig pu nas 'bab pas so //
analyzed: nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum po 'di rnams kyis rtsa brgyad pa dang / dgu pa dang / bcu pa dang / khyim gyi rtsa bcu gcig pa dkyil 'khor lnga 'bab par byed pa ni nyi ma'i rab tu rgyu bas 'dor te rtsa g-yas pa gcig pu nas 'bab pas so //
translated: These thirty-three days are subtracted by the movement of the sun from the eighth, ninth, tenth, and eleventh channel-bases of the houses, which cause the five mandalas to descend, because they descend from the right channel alone.

original: bcu gnyis pa ni rtsa g-yon pa la nyin zhag gnyis dang / dbu ma la nyin zhag gcig gis te lte bar rab tu zhugs pas so //
analyzed: bcu gnyis pa ni rtsa g-yon pa la nyin zhag gnyis dang / dbu ma la nyin zhag gcig gis te lte bar rab tu zhugs pas so //
translated: The twelfth is by two days in the left channel and one day in the central channel, because they enter the navel.

original: de ltar rdzogs pa nas nyin zhag sum cu rtsa drug gis nyin mor byed pa'i 'chi ltas kyi sbyor bas mi rnams 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar rdzogs pa nas nyin zhag sum cu rtsa drug gis nyin mor byed pa'i 'chi ltas kyi sbyor bas mi rnams 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, after completion, by thirty-six days, the conjunction of the death signs of the sun causes the death of humans.

original: bshad pa gnyis pa'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: bshad pa gnyis pa'i nges pa'o //
translated: This is the determination of the second explanation.

original: da ni sngon du zhes pa la sogs pas 'dab ma bcu gnyis la lo gsum gyi nyin zhag 'dor ba gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni sngon du zhes pa la sogs pas 'dab ma bcu gnyis la lo gsum gyi nyin zhag 'dor ba gsungs te /
translated: Now, beginning with ‚Äúnow,‚Äù he explains the subtraction of the days of three years from the twelve petals:

original: 'dir khyim gyi 'khor lo la skye ba'i dus sbyor gyi rtsa ni sngon zhes brjod de /
analyzed: 'dir khyim gyi 'khor lo la skye ba'i dus sbyor gyi rtsa ni sngon zhes brjod de /
translated: Here, the channel of the birth conjunction in the wheel of the houses is called ‚Äúbefore.‚Äù

original: skye ba'i dus sbyor gyi 'dab ma de la lo gsum gyi nyin zhag gi tshogs stong brgyad cu'i nang nas /
analyzed: skye ba'i dus sbyor gyi 'dab ma de la lo gsum gyi nyin zhag gi tshogs stong brgyad cu'i nang nas /
translated: On that petal of the time of birth, 360 days and nights are subtracted from the total of 1,200 days and nights of three years.

original: mda' dang / me dang / 'jig rten zhes pa nyin zhag gi tshogs sum cu rtsa lnga lhag pa'i sum brgya 'dor bar byed do //
analyzed: mda' dang / me dang / 'jig rten zhes pa nyin zhag gi tshogs sum cu rtsa lnga lhag pa'i sum brgya 'dor bar byed do //
translated: The 360 days and nights are subtracted in the following way: 350 days and nights of the ‚Äúarrow, fire, and world‚Äù are subtracted.

original: de nas 'dab ma de stong par byas te lhag ma'i nyin zhag gi tshogs bzung nas srog gi nus pa 'dab ma gnyis pa la 'jug go //
analyzed: de nas 'dab ma de stong par byas te lhag ma'i nyin zhag gi tshogs bzung nas srog gi nus pa 'dab ma gnyis pa la 'jug go //
translated: Then, that petal is made empty, and the remaining days and nights are taken. The power of life enters the second petal.

original: nyin zhag gi tshogs de las rgyu ba dang bcas pa ste /
analyzed: nyin zhag gi tshogs de las rgyu ba dang bcas pa ste /
translated: From that total of days and nights, 10 days and nights of movement are added.

original: snga ma las 'dab ma phyi mar rgyu ba'i nyin zhag bcu dang lhan cig tu mda' dus rtse mo can zhes pa nyin zhag gi tshogs bzhi bcu rtsa lnga lhag pa'i sum brgya 'dab ma gnyis pa la 'dor ro //
analyzed: snga ma las 'dab ma phyi mar rgyu ba'i nyin zhag bcu dang lhan cig tu mda' dus rtse mo can zhes pa nyin zhag gi tshogs bzhi bcu rtsa lnga lhag pa'i sum brgya 'dab ma gnyis pa la 'dor ro //
translated: Together with the 10 days and nights of movement from the previous petal to the next petal, 350 days and nights of the ‚Äúarrow, time, and peak‚Äù are subtracted on the second petal.

original: de nas lhag ma bzung nas 'dab ma gsum pa la 'jug ste gnyis pa stong par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas lhag ma bzung nas 'dab ma gsum pa la 'jug ste gnyis pa stong par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, the remainder is taken and enters the third petal, and the second petal becomes empty.

original: slar yang de nyid la rgyu ba'i nyin @250a * //
analyzed: slar yang de nyid la rgyu ba'i nyin @250a * //
translated: Again, one moves in that.üîΩ

original: zhag bco lnga dang lhan cig nyin zhag bdun cu lhag pa'i brgya 'dab ma gsum pa la 'dor ro //
analyzed: zhag bco lnga dang lhan cig nyin zhag bdun cu lhag pa'i brgya 'dab ma gsum pa la 'dor ro //
translated: Again, for fifteen days in that same place, together with seventy-one days, it is emitted in the three-petaled one.

original: lhag ma bzung nas bzhi pa la 'jug ste gsum ba stong par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lhag ma bzung nas bzhi pa la 'jug ste gsum ba stong par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having taken the remainder, it enters the fourth, and the third becomes empty.

original: de nas rgyu ba'i nyin zhag nyi shu dang lhan cig mig sbrul zhes pa nyin zhag gi tshogs brgyad cu rtsa gnyis 'dab ma bzhi pa la 'dor ro //
analyzed: de nas rgyu ba'i nyin zhag nyi shu dang lhan cig mig sbrul zhes pa nyin zhag gi tshogs brgyad cu rtsa gnyis 'dab ma bzhi pa la 'dor ro //
translated: Then, together with twenty days of movement, the snake eye, a collection of 182 days, is emitted in the four-petaled one.

original: lhag ma bzung nas lnga pa la 'jug ste bzhi pa la stong par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lhag ma bzung nas lnga pa la 'jug ste bzhi pa la stong par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having taken the remainder, it enters the fifth, and the fourth becomes empty.

original: slar yang rgyu ba'i nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa lnga dang lhan cig ri bo mda' ste nyin zhag gi tshogs lnga bcu rtsa bdun 'dor ro //
analyzed: slar yang rgyu ba'i nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa lnga dang lhan cig ri bo mda' ste nyin zhag gi tshogs lnga bcu rtsa bdun 'dor ro //
translated: Again, together with twenty-five days of movement, the mountain arrow, a collection of 57 days, is emitted.

original: lhag ma bzung nas drug pa la 'jug ste lnga pa stong par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lhag ma bzung nas drug pa la 'jug ste lnga pa stong par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having taken the remainder, it enters the sixth, and the fifth becomes empty.

original: slar yang rgyu ba'i nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa drug dang lhan cig nyin zhag gi tshogs nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'dor ro //
analyzed: slar yang rgyu ba'i nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa drug dang lhan cig nyin zhag gi tshogs nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'dor ro //
translated: Again, twenty-six days of movement are discarded together with the twenty-eight days of the collection of days.

original: de nas 'dab ma bdun pa la 'jug ste drug pa stong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas 'dab ma bdun pa la 'jug ste drug pa stong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, it enters the seventh petal and the sixth petal becomes empty.

original: de nas bdun pa la rgyu ba'i nyin zhag gi tshogs nyi shu rtsa bdun 'dor ro //
analyzed: de nas bdun pa la rgyu ba'i nyin zhag gi tshogs nyi shu rtsa bdun 'dor ro //
translated: Then, twenty-seven days of the collection of days of movement are discarded in the seventh petal.

original: lhag ma nyin zhag gi tshogs sum cu rtsa drug bzung nas 'dab ma brgyad par 'jug ste bdun pa stong par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lhag ma nyin zhag gi tshogs sum cu rtsa drug bzung nas 'dab ma brgyad par 'jug ste bdun pa stong par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having retained the remaining thirty-six days of the collection of days, it enters the eighth petal and the seventh petal becomes empty.

original: de nas brgyad pa la nyin zhag bcva lnga 'dor ro //
analyzed: de nas brgyad pa la nyin zhag bcva lnga 'dor ro //
translated: Then, fifteen days are discarded in the eighth petal.

original: lhag ma nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig bzung ba nas dgu pa la 'jug ste brgyad pa stong par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lhag ma nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig bzung ba nas dgu pa la 'jug ste brgyad pa stong par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having retained the remaining twenty-one days, it enters the ninth petal and the eighth petal becomes empty.

original: de nas dgu pa la nyin zhag bcu 'dor ro //
analyzed: de nas dgu pa la nyin zhag bcu 'dor ro //
translated: Then, ten days are discarded in the ninth petal.

original: lhag ma nyin zhag bcu gcig bzung nas bcu pa la 'jug ste bdun pa stong par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lhag ma nyin zhag bcu gcig bzung nas bcu pa la 'jug ste bdun pa stong par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having retained the remaining eleven days, it enters the tenth petal and the seventh petal becomes empty.

original: de nas bcu pa la nyin zhag lnga 'dor ro //
analyzed: de nas bcu pa la nyin zhag lnga 'dor ro //
translated: Then, five days are discarded in the tenth petal.

original: lhag ma nyin zhag drug bzung nas bcu gcig pa la 'jug ste bcu pa stong par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lhag ma nyin zhag drug bzung nas bcu gcig pa la 'jug ste bcu pa stong par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having held the remaining six days and nights, it enters the eleventh, and the tenth becomes empty.

original: de la nyin zhag gsum 'dor ro //
analyzed: de la nyin zhag gsum 'dor ro //
translated: Three days and nights are discarded there.

original: lhag ma nyin zhag gsum bzung nas bcu gnyis pa 'jug ste bcu gcig pa stong par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lhag ma nyin zhag gsum bzung nas bcu gnyis pa 'jug ste bcu gcig pa stong par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having held the remaining three days and nights, it enters the twelfth, and the eleventh becomes empty.

original: de la nyin zhag gnyis 'dor ro //
analyzed: de la nyin zhag gnyis 'dor ro //
translated: Two days and nights are discarded there.

original: lhag ma nyin zhag gcig bzung nas lte ba la 'jug ste khyim gyi 'dab ma bcu gnyis pa'i rtsa stong par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lhag ma nyin zhag gcig bzung nas lte ba la 'jug ste khyim gyi 'dab ma bcu gnyis pa'i rtsa stong par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having held the remaining one day and night, it enters the navel, and the channel of the twelfth petal of the house becomes empty.

original: de ltar nyi ma'i dbu ma'i lo gsum gyi nyin zhag stong brgyad cu'i grangs rnams kyis srog gi nus pas khyim gyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa 'dor ro //
analyzed: de ltar nyi ma'i dbu ma'i lo gsum gyi nyin zhag stong brgyad cu'i grangs rnams kyis srog gi nus pas khyim gyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa 'dor ro //
translated: In this way, by the number of the one thousand eight hundred days and nights of three middle-sun years, the life force discards the twelve-spoked wheel of the houses.

original: de nas lte ba la nyin zhag gcig dbu mar 'bab ste de nas dbugs kyi 'khor lo btang nas rnam par shes pa srog gi rlung dang lhan cig 'gro ba drug po gzhan du 'pho bar byed do //
analyzed: de nas lte ba la nyin zhag gcig dbu mar 'bab ste de nas dbugs kyi 'khor lo btang nas rnam par shes pa srog gi rlung dang lhan cig 'gro ba drug po gzhan du 'pho bar byed do //
translated: Then, one day and night falls in the middle at the navel, and then, having discarded the wheel of the breath, consciousness moves elsewhere with the life-force wind.

original: nyi ma'i 'chi ltas kyi nges pa'o //
analyzed: nyi ma'i 'chi ltas kyi nges pa'o //
translated: The determination of the death omens of the sun.

original: @250b 'dir dgod pa ni sngar gyi dgod pa bzhin du rim pa gnyis la lo'i dbye ba dang nyin zhag 'dor ba'i dbye ba ste rim pa snga ma la 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag dgod cing rim pa phyi ma la lhag ma tshe'i nyin zhag dgod do //
analyzed: @250b 'dir dgod pa ni sngar gyi dgod pa bzhin du rim pa gnyis la lo'i dbye ba dang nyin zhag 'dor ba'i dbye ba ste rim pa snga ma la 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag dgod cing rim pa phyi ma la lhag ma tshe'i nyin zhag dgod do //
translated: Here, the setting is as before, with the division of years and the division of days subtracted. In the former sequence, the death omens are set in days, and in the latter sequence, the remaining life is set in days.

original: 'khor lo gnyis pa la nyin zhag 'dor ba dgod cing snga ma'i 'dab ma ma rnams la rim pas stong pa dgod do //
analyzed: 'khor lo gnyis pa la nyin zhag 'dor ba dgod cing snga ma'i 'dab ma ma rnams la rim pas stong pa dgod do //
translated: In the second wheel, the subtraction of days is set, and the empty [squares] of the former petals are set in sequence.

original: g-yas pa'i rtsa mnyam pa'i dus sbyor la skyes pa rnams la nyi ma'i 'chi ltas te mi mnyam pa'i dus sbyor la skyes pa tshe thung ba rnams la zla ba'i 'chi ltas so //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i rtsa mnyam pa'i dus sbyor la skyes pa rnams la nyi ma'i 'chi ltas te mi mnyam pa'i dus sbyor la skyes pa tshe thung ba rnams la zla ba'i 'chi ltas so //
translated: For men born in an even sign, there are the death omens of the sun; for those born in an odd sign, with short lives, there are the death omens of the moon.

original: nyi ma'i 'chi ltas kyi nges pa'o //
analyzed: nyi ma'i 'chi ltas kyi nges pa'o //
translated: The determination of the death omens of the sun.

original: da ni nyi ma'i dbu ma'i 'chi ltas dus kyi lo'i rim pas lo brgya'i mtshams su byis pa'i skye bo mu stegs pa rnams kyis brjod pa sems can rnams rmongs pa skyed par byed pa gang yin pa de'i dgag pa brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: da ni nyi ma'i dbu ma'i 'chi ltas dus kyi lo'i rim pas lo brgya'i mtshams su byis pa'i skye bo mu stegs pa rnams kyis brjod pa sems can rnams rmongs pa skyed par byed pa gang yin pa de'i dgag pa brjod par bya'o //
translated: Now, the signs of death of the central sun, in terms of the sequence of years, will be explained, which is what causes the confusion of beings, as described by the tƒ´rthikas, at the end of a hundred years.

original: 'dir mu stegs pa rnams brjod pa grag ste rtsa g-yas pa la chu tshod lnga rab tu rgyu bas tshe lo brgya'o //
analyzed: 'dir mu stegs pa rnams brjod pa grag ste rtsa g-yas pa la chu tshod lnga rab tu rgyu bas tshe lo brgya'o //
translated: Here, the tƒ´rthikas say that when the right nƒÅ·∏çƒ´ moves for five hours, the lifespan is one hundred years.

original: chu tshod drug rab tu rgyu bas tshe lo dgu bcu'o //
analyzed: chu tshod drug rab tu rgyu bas tshe lo dgu bcu'o //
translated: When it moves for six hours, the lifespan is ninety years.

original: chu tshod bdun rab tu rgyu bas tshe lo brgyad cu'o //
analyzed: chu tshod bdun rab tu rgyu bas tshe lo brgyad cu'o //
translated: When it moves for seven hours, the lifespan is eighty years.

original: chu tshod brgyad rab tu rgyu bas tshe lo lnga bcu'o //
analyzed: chu tshod brgyad rab tu rgyu bas tshe lo lnga bcu'o //
translated: When it moves for eight hours, the lifespan is fifty years.

original: chu tshod dgu rab tu rgyu bas tshe lo sum cu'o //
analyzed: chu tshod dgu rab tu rgyu bas tshe lo sum cu'o //
translated: When it moves for nine hours, the lifespan is thirty years.

original: chu tshod bcu rab tu rgyu bas tshe lo nyi shu rtsa drug go //
analyzed: chu tshod bcu rab tu rgyu bas tshe lo nyi shu rtsa drug go //
translated: When it moves for ten hours, the lifespan is twenty-six years.

original: chu tshod bco lnga rab tu rgyu bas tshe lo bcu bzhi'o //
analyzed: chu tshod bco lnga rab tu rgyu bas tshe lo bcu bzhi'o //
translated: When it moves for fifteen hours, the lifespan is fourteen years.

original: chu tshod sum cu rab tu rgyu bas tshe lo bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: chu tshod sum cu rab tu rgyu bas tshe lo bcu gnyis so //
translated: Thirty praharas make twelve years.

original: nyin zhag gcig rab tu rgyu bas tshe lo bcu'o //
analyzed: nyin zhag gcig rab tu rgyu bas tshe lo bcu'o //
translated: One day and night makes ten years.

original: nyin zhag gnyis rab tu rgyu bas tshe lo brgyad do //
analyzed: nyin zhag gnyis rab tu rgyu bas tshe lo brgyad do //
translated: Two days and nights make eight years.

original: nyin zhag gsum rab tu rgyu bas tshe lo drug go //
analyzed: nyin zhag gsum rab tu rgyu bas tshe lo drug go //
translated: Three days and nights make six years.

original: nyin zhag bzhi rab tu rgyu bas tshe lo lnga'o //
analyzed: nyin zhag bzhi rab tu rgyu bas tshe lo lnga'o //
translated: Four days and nights make five years.üîΩThen, with days and nights, life is three years.

original: de nas nyin zhag la rab tu rgyu bas tshe lo gsum mo zhes pa ni mu stegs pa rnams kyi g-yas kyi lam la chu tshod dang dbugs kyi nges pa'o //
analyzed: de nas nyin zhag la rab tu rgyu bas tshe lo gsum mo zhes pa ni mu stegs pa rnams kyi g-yas kyi lam la chu tshod dang dbugs kyi nges pa'o //
translated: This is the calculation of praharas and breaths in the right path of the tƒ´rthikas.

original: de nyid ni thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs pa'i rigs pas rnam par dpyad na mi 'thad de 'dir mi rnams kyi 'chi ltas med pa la g-yon dang g-yas kyi rtsa la lnga ste mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa'i dus sbyor rnams la dbyug gu lngar srog gi rlung
analyzed: de nyid ni thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs pa'i rigs pas rnam par dpyad na mi 'thad de 'dir mi rnams kyi 'chi ltas med pa la g-yon dang g-yas kyi rtsa la lnga ste mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa'i dus sbyor rnams la dbyug gu lngar srog gi rlung
translated: This is not tenable when analyzed by the reasoning taught by the Omniscient One. Here, in the absence of the signs of death of humans, the life-force vƒÅyu moves in five nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s in the left and right channels during the even and uneven yƒÅmas.

original: 'bab bo // skyes bu tshe lo brgya'i srog ni g-yon dang g-yas pa dag la lo bdun du bgrod pa'i dbye bas dbugs 'phel lo //
analyzed: 'bab bo // skyes bu tshe lo brgya'i srog ni g-yon dang g-yas pa dag la lo bdun du bgrod pa'i dbye bas dbugs 'phel lo //
translated: The life of a person with a life span of one hundred years increases by seven years for each of the seven right and left movements.

original: de nas lo drug cu rnams ni bgrod pa 'phel ba'i dbye bas chu srang 'phel lo //üîΩde nas lo sum cu @251a * //üîΩrnams ni zla ba gsum gyis dbye bas chu tshod 'phel lo //
analyzed: de nas lo drug cu rnams ni bgrod pa 'phel ba'i dbye bas chu srang 'phel lo // de nas lo sum cu @251a * // rnams ni zla ba gsum gyis dbye bas chu tshod 'phel lo //
translated: Then, the sixty years increase by the division of the increase of movement.üîΩThen, the thirty years increase by the division of three months.üîΩThen, the three years and three half months increase by the division of days.

original: de nas lo gsum dang phyogs gsum ni nyin zhag gi dbye bas 'phel lo zhes pa ni dus 'phel ba'i rigs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas lo gsum dang phyogs gsum ni nyin zhag gi dbye bas 'phel lo zhes pa ni dus 'phel ba'i rigs pa'o //
translated: This is the principle of the increase of time.

original: rigs pa 'di las mngal nas skyes pa'i byis pa gang zhig dus ma yin par 'chi bar 'gyur ba /
analyzed: rigs pa 'di las mngal nas skyes pa'i byis pa gang zhig dus ma yin par 'chi bar 'gyur ba /
translated: By this principle, if a child born from a womb dies at an untimely death,

original: lo gsum mam /
analyzed: lo gsum mam /
translated: at three years,

original: lo lnga 'am /
analyzed: lo lnga 'am /
translated: at five years,

original: lo bcu gnyis sam /
analyzed: lo bcu gnyis sam /
translated: at twelve years,

original: nyi shu la sogs pas 'chi ba de la chu tshod lnga'i steng du chu tshod drug dang / bdun la sogs pa rab tu rgyu ba'i rim pa ni don med pa ste /
analyzed: nyi shu la sogs pas 'chi ba de la chu tshod lnga'i steng du chu tshod drug dang / bdun la sogs pa rab tu rgyu ba'i rim pa ni don med pa ste /
translated: at twenty years, and so on, the movement of the six hours above the five hours, the seven hours, and so on, is meaningless.

original: mngal nas skyes pa nas lo gsum 'chi ba'i mtshams yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngal nas skyes pa nas lo gsum 'chi ba'i mtshams yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because death occurs up to three years after birth.

original: 'dir gal te skyes pa'i zla ba gcig gi rjes su 'chi bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: 'dir gal te skyes pa'i zla ba gcig gi rjes su 'chi bar 'gyur na /
translated: If death occurs one month after birth,

original: de'i tshe skyes pa'i nyin zhag nas brtsams te /
analyzed: de'i tshe skyes pa'i nyin zhag nas brtsams te /
translated: then the life-force wind begins to move from the day of birth.

original: srog gi rlung rdzogs pa'i dus nas tshes phyogs mda' dang yon tan la sogs pa rgyu'o //
analyzed: srog gi rlung rdzogs pa'i dus nas tshes phyogs mda' dang yon tan la sogs pa rgyu'o //
translated: From the time of completing the life-force wind, the movement of the lunar mansions, qualities, and so on, occurs.

original: de bzhin du mngal nas skyes pa nas zla ba gnyis kyi mtha' dang / zla ba gsum gyi mtha' dang zla ba bzhi'i mtha' dang / zla ba drug gi mtha' dang / lo'i mtha' dang / lo gnyis kyi mtha' dang / lo gsum gyi mthar 'chi ba ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du mngal nas skyes pa nas zla ba gnyis kyi mtha' dang / zla ba gsum gyi mtha' dang zla ba bzhi'i mtha' dang / zla ba drug gi mtha' dang / lo'i mtha' dang / lo gnyis kyi mtha' dang / lo gsum gyi mthar 'chi ba ni /
translated: Similarly, death occurs at the end of two months after birth, at the end of three months, at the end of four months, at the end of six months, at the end of one year, at the end of two years, and at the end of three years after birth.

original: nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum rgyu ba nas g-yas kyi rtsa la sgra la sogs pa'i yon tan lnga zad pa'i dbye bas nyin zhag lnga rgyu ba dang / g-yon gyi rtsa la snying stobs la sogs pa'i yon tan gsum zad pa'i dbye bas nyin zhag gcig gi bar du lugs las bzlog pas so //
analyzed: nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum rgyu ba nas g-yas kyi rtsa la sgra la sogs pa'i yon tan lnga zad pa'i dbye bas nyin zhag lnga rgyu ba dang / g-yon gyi rtsa la snying stobs la sogs pa'i yon tan gsum zad pa'i dbye bas nyin zhag gcig gi bar du lugs las bzlog pas so //
translated: From the movement of thirty-three days, the life force moves for five days in the right channel by the division of the exhaustion of the five qualities such as sound, and so on, and for one day in the left channel by the division of the exhaustion of the three qualities such as sattva, and so on, in the reverse order.

original: de bzhin du lte ba la srog rab tu zhugs pa las mngal nas skyes pa'i nyin mtshan dang po la yang 'chi bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du lte ba la srog rab tu zhugs pa las mngal nas skyes pa'i nyin mtshan dang po la yang 'chi bar shes par bya'o //
translated: Similarly, one should understand that death occurs in the first day and night of birth from the life force entering the navel.

original: de bzhin du 'dab ma bcu gnyis pa la srog 'char ba las nyin zhag gsum pa la 'chi ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dab ma bcu gnyis pa la srog 'char ba las nyin zhag gsum pa la 'chi ba'o //
translated: Similarly, death occurs on the third day from the life force arising in the twelve-petaled lotus.

original: de bzhin du 'dab ma bcu gcig pa la srog 'char ba las nyin zhag drug pa la'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dab ma bcu gcig pa la srog 'char ba las nyin zhag drug pa la'o //
translated: Similarly, death occurs on the sixth day from the life force arising in the eleven-petaled lotus.

original: de bzhin du khyim gyi 'dab ma bcu pa la srog 'char ba las nyin zhag bcu gcig pa la'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du khyim gyi 'dab ma bcu pa la srog 'char ba las nyin zhag bcu gcig pa la'o //
translated: Similarly, death occurs on the eleventh day from the life force arising in the ten-petaled house.

original: de bzhin du khyim gyi 'dab ma dgu pa la srog 'char ba las nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig pa la'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du khyim gyi 'dab ma dgu pa la srog 'char ba las nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig pa la'o //
translated: In the same way, in the ninth petal of the house, the life wind arises from the life-force channel on the twenty-first day.

original: de bzhin du rim pas khyim gyi 'dab ma brgyad pa la srog 'char ba las nyin zhag sum cu rtsa drug pa la'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rim pas khyim gyi 'dab ma brgyad pa la srog 'char ba las nyin zhag sum cu rtsa drug pa la'o //
translated: In the same way, in the eighth petal of the house, the life wind arises from the life-force channel on the thirty-sixth day.

original: de bzhin du khyim gyi 'dab ma bdun pa la srog 'char ba las zla ba gnyis na'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du khyim gyi 'dab ma bdun pa la srog 'char ba las zla ba gnyis na'o //
translated: In the same way, in the seventh petal of the house, the life wind arises from the life-force channel on the sixty-second day.

original: de bzhin du 'dab ma drug pa la srog 'char ba las @251b zla ba gsum na'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dab ma drug pa la srog 'char ba las @251b zla ba gsum na'o //
translated: In the same way, in the sixth petal of the house, the life wind arises from the life-force channel on the ninety-second day.

original: de bzhin du lnga pa la srog 'char ba las zla ba bzhi na'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du lnga pa la srog 'char ba las zla ba bzhi na'o //
translated: In the same way, in the fifth petal of the house, the life wind arises from the life-force channel on the one hundred and twenty-second day.

original: de bzhin du 'dab ma bzhi pa la nyin zhag nyi shur srog 'char ba las zla ba drug na'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dab ma bzhi pa la nyin zhag nyi shur srog 'char ba las zla ba drug na'o //
translated: In the same way, in the fourth petal of the house, the life wind arises from the life-force channel on the one hundred and forty-second day.

original: de bzhin du phyogs dang bcas par gsum pa la srog 'char ba las lo gcig na'o //üîΩnyin zhag bcu gnyis pa la srog 'char ba las lo gnyis na'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du phyogs dang bcas par gsum pa la srog 'char ba las lo gcig na'o // nyin zhag bcu gnyis pa la srog 'char ba las lo gnyis na'o //
translated: In the same way, in the third petal of the house, the life wind arises from the life-force channel on the one hundred and sixty-second day.üîΩIn the second petal of the house, the life wind arises from the life-force channel on the one hundred and eighty-second day.

original: dang po la srog 'char ba las lo gsum na'o //
analyzed: dang po la srog 'char ba las lo gsum na'o //
translated: In the first petal of the house, the life wind arises from the life-force channel on the two hundred and second day.

original: lo bzhi pa la nyin zhag ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: lo bzhi pa la nyin zhag ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not correct that the life span is one day for the fourth.

original: mngal nas skyes pa nas lo brgya'i mtshams kyi bar du'o //
analyzed: mngal nas skyes pa nas lo brgya'i mtshams kyi bar du'o //
translated: The life span of those born from the womb is one day for each year until one hundred years.

original: 'di ni nyi ma'i 'chi ltas kyi nges pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni nyi ma'i 'chi ltas kyi nges pa ste /
translated: This is the rule for the death omens of the sun.

original: nyi ma'i ji lta ba de bzhin du snying stobs la sogs pa yon tan gsum gyi dbye bas mngal nas skyes pa la zla ba'i 'chi ltas kyi nges pa'o //
analyzed: nyi ma'i ji lta ba de bzhin du snying stobs la sogs pa yon tan gsum gyi dbye bas mngal nas skyes pa la zla ba'i 'chi ltas kyi nges pa'o //
translated: Just as it is for the sun, so it is for those born from the womb, in terms of the death omens of the moon, by the division of the three qualities of sattva and so on.

original: de bzhin du phyi ma'i steng gi rna ba las dbang phyug gis smras pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du phyi ma'i steng gi rna ba las dbang phyug gis smras pa /
translated: Similarly, the ear of the external sun says:

original: ji ltar g-yon pa de bzhin g-yas //
analyzed: ji ltar g-yon pa de bzhin g-yas //
translated: Just as it is for the left, so it is for the right.

original: de bzhin nyid du dbu ma yang //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid du dbu ma yang //
translated: Just so it is for the middle.

original: lo gsum mthar ni 'chi ba ster //üîΩzhes pa ste /
analyzed: lo gsum mthar ni 'chi ba ster // zhes pa ste /
translated: It gives death at the end of three years.

original: gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha' la yang la lar nges pa yod do //
analyzed: gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha' la yang la lar nges pa yod do //
translated: In other philosophical systems, there are also some certainties.

original: zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'chi ltas kyi nges pa'o //
analyzed: zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'chi ltas kyi nges pa'o //
translated: This is the rule for the death omens of the moon and sun.

original: 'di ltar mngal nas skyes pa rnams kyi las las nyin zhag gcig nas brtsams te /
analyzed: 'di ltar mngal nas skyes pa rnams kyi las las nyin zhag gcig nas brtsams te /
translated: Thus, for those born from the womb, from one day up to

original: lo gsum gyi mthar nyin zhag so so la 'chi ba'i dbye bas stong brgyad cu'i dbye ba tha dad pa'i byis pa'i 'chi ba gang yin pa de ni zla ba'i lam mam /
analyzed: lo gsum gyi mthar nyin zhag so so la 'chi ba'i dbye bas stong brgyad cu'i dbye ba tha dad pa'i byis pa'i 'chi ba gang yin pa de ni zla ba'i lam mam /
translated: At the end of three years, the death of a child, which is a different type of death, occurs every day.üîΩ

original: nyi ma'i lam 'di la nges pa med do //
analyzed: nyi ma'i lam 'di la nges pa med do //
translated: At the end of three years, the death of a child, which is distinguished by the different divisions of the eighty thousand [death omens] in each day and night, is not certain on the lunar path or on the solar path.

original: 'on kyang rtsa las dbugs rab rgyu ba'i 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag rnams kyis srog gi grangs shes par byed do //
analyzed: 'on kyang rtsa las dbugs rab rgyu ba'i 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag rnams kyis srog gi grangs shes par byed do //
translated: However, the number of life [spans] is known by the days of the death omens, the movement of the breath through the channels.

original: de'i phyir 'chi ltas kyi 'khor lo ni 'chi ba'i 'khor lo ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'chi ltas kyi 'khor lo ni 'chi ba'i 'khor lo ste /
translated: Therefore, the wheel of the death omens is the wheel of death.

original: khyim gyi 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams las srog gis dkyil 'khor lnga rgyu ba go rims kyis yongs su 'dor ro //
analyzed: khyim gyi 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams las srog gis dkyil 'khor lnga rgyu ba go rims kyis yongs su 'dor ro //
translated: From the channels of the house wheel, the five mandalas of life are completely abandoned in sequence.

original: de nas lte ba la rab tu zhugs pa'i nyin zhag de la 'chi'o zhes pa ni rigs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas lte ba la rab tu zhugs pa'i nyin zhag de la 'chi'o zhes pa ni rigs pa'o //
translated: Then, it is reasonable to say that one dies on the day when [life] enters the navel.

original: nyi ma'i dbu ma rab tu rgyu bas lo brgya'i mtshams su lo gsum gyi dus kyi mtshan nyid 'di ni yongs su brtags pas /
analyzed: nyi ma'i dbu ma rab tu rgyu bas lo brgya'i mtshams su lo gsum gyi dus kyi mtshan nyid 'di ni yongs su brtags pas /
translated: By the movement of the central sun, this characteristic of the three years at the end of a hundred years is imagined.

original: sems can thams cad kyi 'chi bar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so zhes zer ro //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi 'chi bar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so zhes zer ro //
translated: The Blessed One has said that all beings die.

original: de nyid ni zla ba'i phyogs gsum gyi chos kyis zla ba'i 'chi ltas su mi 'gyur te /üîΩ'dir gang zhig zla ba'i chos kyis 'chi @252a * //
analyzed: de nyid ni zla ba'i phyogs gsum gyi chos kyis zla ba'i 'chi ltas su mi 'gyur te / 'dir gang zhig zla ba'i chos kyis 'chi @252a * //
translated: That very [death] does not become a death sign of the moon due to the three-part lunar property.

original: ltas kyi 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba des na byis pa mi mkhas pa rnams kyis rab tu brtags pa'o //
analyzed: ltas kyi 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba des na byis pa mi mkhas pa rnams kyis rab tu brtags pa'o //
translated: Here, that which does not become a death due to a death sign of the moon is thoroughly imagined by the childish who are not skilled.

original: g-yon pa'i rtsa la zla ba'i chos las 'chi ltas kyi 'chi ba ji ltar med /
analyzed: g-yon pa'i rtsa la zla ba'i chos las 'chi ltas kyi 'chi ba ji ltar med /
translated: How is there no death due to a death sign of the moon from the lunar property in the left [channel]?

original: g-yas pa la nyi ma rab tu rgyu ba las 'chi ltas kyi 'chi bar thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs so zhes pa ni mi shes pa rnams kyi tshig go //
analyzed: g-yas pa la nyi ma rab tu rgyu ba las 'chi ltas kyi 'chi bar thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs so zhes pa ni mi shes pa rnams kyi tshig go //
translated: The statement The Omniscient One has said that all [deaths] are deaths due to death signs from the movement of the sun in the right [channel] is the words of the ignorant.

original: 'dir lo gsum gyi lhag pa'i lha ni nyi ma'i sgras srog gi rlung ste /
analyzed: 'dir lo gsum gyi lhag pa'i lha ni nyi ma'i sgras srog gi rlung ste /
translated: Here, the god that remains for three years is the life-force wind, called the sun.

original: phyogs gsum gyi bdag po zla ba'i sgras thur sel gyi rlung ngo //
analyzed: phyogs gsum gyi bdag po zla ba'i sgras thur sel gyi rlung ngo //
translated: The lord of the three parts, called the moon, is the downward-voiding wind.

original: 'dir ai da dang / dmar ser dang / su shu mna rnams kyi bdag po ni srog dang nyi ma ste /
analyzed: 'dir ai da dang / dmar ser dang / su shu mna rnams kyi bdag po ni srog dang nyi ma ste /
translated: Here, the lords of the moon, sun, and Mars are life, the sun, and the wind,

original: lte ba las steng du rab tu rgyu ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lte ba las steng du rab tu rgyu ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because they move above the navel.

original: bshang ba dang / gci ba dang / khu ba'i rtsa rnams kyi bdag po ni thur sel te /
analyzed: bshang ba dang / gci ba dang / khu ba'i rtsa rnams kyi bdag po ni thur sel te /
translated: The lords of the channels of feces, urine, and semen are the downward-voiding wind,

original: lte ba las 'og tu rab tu rgyu ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lte ba las 'og tu rab tu rgyu ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because they move below the navel.

original: de ltar na zla ba la 'og tu yon tan gsum dang / nyi ma la steng du dkyil 'khor dang / yul lnga'i yon tan lnga'o //
analyzed: de ltar na zla ba la 'og tu yon tan gsum dang / nyi ma la steng du dkyil 'khor dang / yul lnga'i yon tan lnga'o //
translated: Thus, the moon has three qualities below, and the sun has the five ma·πá·∏çalas and five qualities of the objects above.

original: des na 'og dang steng gi rtsa dag las yon tan gsum gyi dbye bas g-yon pa la zla ba'i 'chi ltas dang / yon tan lnga'i dbye bas g-yas pa la nyi ma'i 'chi ltas so //
analyzed: des na 'og dang steng gi rtsa dag las yon tan gsum gyi dbye bas g-yon pa la zla ba'i 'chi ltas dang / yon tan lnga'i dbye bas g-yas pa la nyi ma'i 'chi ltas so //
translated: Therefore, the lunar death omens are on the left, due to the division of the three qualities in the lower and upper channels, and the solar death omens are on the right, due to the division of the five qualities.

original: zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'chi ltas kyi nges pa'o //
analyzed: zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'chi ltas kyi nges pa'o //
translated: This is the determination of the lunar and solar death omens.

original: da ni dus kyi lo zhes pa la sogs pas dbu ma yongs su rdzogs pa'i dus su 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni dus kyi lo zhes pa la sogs pas dbu ma yongs su rdzogs pa'i dus su 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid gsungs te /
translated: Now, in order to explain the characteristics of death at the time of the completion of the central channel, it is said, ‚Äúthe year of time,‚Äù and so on.

original: 'dir skyes pa dang / bud med rnams kyi lus la snying stobs dang / rdul dang / mun pa'i dbye bas srog rab tu rgyu ste /
analyzed: 'dir skyes pa dang / bud med rnams kyi lus la snying stobs dang / rdul dang / mun pa'i dbye bas srog rab tu rgyu ste /
translated: In this world, the life force moves through the bodies of men and women, divided into sattva, rajas, and tamas.

original: phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba bcu lhag pa'i lo dgu bcu rtsa drug gi bar du g-yon dang g-yas la dkyil 'khor lnga 'bab bo //
analyzed: phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba bcu lhag pa'i lo dgu bcu rtsa drug gi bar du g-yon dang g-yas la dkyil 'khor lnga 'bab bo //
translated: For ninety-six years, with half months added, the five mandalas descend on the left and right.

original: lo gsum dang phyogs gsum gyi bar ni dbu ma'i dus te tshe lo brgya pa'i mi rnams kyi nges pa'o //
analyzed: lo gsum dang phyogs gsum gyi bar ni dbu ma'i dus te tshe lo brgya pa'i mi rnams kyi nges pa'o //
translated: For three years and three half months, the life force moves through the madhyama. This is the rule for humans with a life span of one hundred years.

original: de la g-yon pa dang / g-yas pa dang / dbu ma'i rtsa gsum gyi snying stobs dang / rdul dang mun pa'i rang bzhin can te /
analyzed: de la g-yon pa dang / g-yas pa dang / dbu ma'i rtsa gsum gyi snying stobs dang / rdul dang mun pa'i rang bzhin can te /
translated: The three channels on the left, right, and in the middle have the natures of sattva, rajas, and tamas, respectively.

original: 'di rnams las 'chi ba ni mun pa'i rtsa la rgyu ba'i grangs srog dang thur sel gyi rang bzhin gyis bzung nas g-yon pa dang g-yas pa la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i nyin zhag gis rgyu ste dus kyi lo ste lo gsum dang / phyogs gsum gyi bar du nyin zhag bgrod pa'i dbang gis zhes pa la /
analyzed: 'di rnams las 'chi ba ni mun pa'i rtsa la rgyu ba'i grangs srog dang thur sel gyi rang bzhin gyis bzung nas g-yon pa dang g-yas pa la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i nyin zhag gis rgyu ste dus kyi lo ste lo gsum dang / phyogs gsum gyi bar du nyin zhag bgrod pa'i dbang gis zhes pa la /
translated: The vƒÅyu moves for a period of three years and three half months, by the power of the movement of the days.

original: nyin zhag ni nyi shu rtsa lnga lhag pa'i brgya phrag bcu gcig ste /
analyzed: nyin zhag ni nyi shu rtsa lnga lhag pa'i brgya phrag bcu gcig ste /
translated: There are 1,125 days.

original: de dag gi bgrod pa'i dbang gis @252b ji srid srog zad par 'gyur ba de srid du 'pho zhing rgyu bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: de dag gi bgrod pa'i dbang gis @252b ji srid srog zad par 'gyur ba de srid du 'pho zhing rgyu bar byed pa ste /
translated: By the power of their movement, the vƒÅyu moves and shifts until the life-force is exhausted.

original: zla ba zhes bya ste g-yon pa'i lam dang / nyi ma'i lam g-yas pa la mi mnyam mnyam pa'i nyin zhag re re 'phel bas rim pas so zhes pa ni gal te lug la sogs pa mi mnyam pa'i dus sbyor la skyes par gyur na g-yon pa'i rtsa la nyin zhag gcig rgyu'o //
analyzed: zla ba zhes bya ste g-yon pa'i lam dang / nyi ma'i lam g-yas pa la mi mnyam mnyam pa'i nyin zhag re re 'phel bas rim pas so zhes pa ni gal te lug la sogs pa mi mnyam pa'i dus sbyor la skyes par gyur na g-yon pa'i rtsa la nyin zhag gcig rgyu'o //
translated: If one is born in an uneven muhurta such as Aries, one moves for one day in the left channel.

original: gal te glang la sogs pa mnyam pa'i dus sbyor la skyes par gyur na g-yas pa la nyin zhag gnyis rgyu'o //
analyzed: gal te glang la sogs pa mnyam pa'i dus sbyor la skyes par gyur na g-yas pa la nyin zhag gnyis rgyu'o //
translated: If one is born in an even muhurta such as Taurus, one moves for two days in the right channel.

original: de nas slar yang 'pho ba'i dbye ba ni mi mnyam mnyam pa'i nyin zhag rnams kyis g-yon pa la rgyu ba'i mjug dang / g-yas pa la rgyu ba'i mjug tu rgyu ba'i nyin zhag gi ched kyis byed pa ni bcu gnyis rtsibs kyi khyim gyi 'khor lo la rim pas dkyil 'khor lnga yongs su dor ba'i slad du ste /
analyzed: de nas slar yang 'pho ba'i dbye ba ni mi mnyam mnyam pa'i nyin zhag rnams kyis g-yon pa la rgyu ba'i mjug dang / g-yas pa la rgyu ba'i mjug tu rgyu ba'i nyin zhag gi ched kyis byed pa ni bcu gnyis rtsibs kyi khyim gyi 'khor lo la rim pas dkyil 'khor lnga yongs su dor ba'i slad du ste /
translated: Then, the division of the transits is that the uneven and even days are for the purpose of moving at the end of the movement in the left and the end of the movement in the right.

original: g-yon gyi rtsa la nam mkha' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor zad pa'i don du 'pho bar byed cing g-yas kyi rtsal  sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor zad pa'i don du 'pho bar byed do //
analyzed: g-yon gyi rtsa la nam mkha' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor zad pa'i don du 'pho bar byed cing g-yas kyi rtsal  sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor zad pa'i don du 'pho bar byed do //
translated: It moves in the left channel for the purpose of eliminating the space ma·πá·∏çala, and so on, and it moves in the right channel for the purpose of eliminating the earth ma·πá·∏çala, and so on.

original: 'dir g-yon pa la rgyu ba'i nyin zhag lnga dang / 'pho ba'i nyin zhag rnams kyis lug la sogs pa mi mnyam pa'i 'dab ma drug po rnams la stong pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu 'bab pa srog gi rlung gis 'dor ro //
analyzed: 'dir g-yon pa la rgyu ba'i nyin zhag lnga dang / 'pho ba'i nyin zhag rnams kyis lug la sogs pa mi mnyam pa'i 'dab ma drug po rnams la stong pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu 'bab pa srog gi rlung gis 'dor ro //
translated: Here, the five days of movement in the left and the six days of movement in the right eliminate the empty ma·πá·∏çala in the six uneven petals, such as Aries, and so on, and the life vƒÅyu moves.

original: g-yas pa la rgyu ba'i nyin zhag drug dang / 'pho ba'i nyin zhag drug rnams kyis glang la sogs pa mnyam pa'i dus sbyor drug po rnams la sa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu 'bab pa srog gis 'dor ro //
analyzed: g-yas pa la rgyu ba'i nyin zhag drug dang / 'pho ba'i nyin zhag drug rnams kyis glang la sogs pa mnyam pa'i dus sbyor drug po rnams la sa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu 'bab pa srog gis 'dor ro //
translated: The six days of movement in the right and the six days of movement in the left eliminate the earth ma·πá·∏çala in the six even houses, such as Taurus, and so on, and the life vƒÅyu moves.

original: de bzhin du g-yon pa'i rtsa la nyin zhag bcu gcig gis rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'dor ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du g-yon pa'i rtsa la nyin zhag bcu gcig gis rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'dor ro //
translated: In the same way, the eleven days of movement in the left eliminate the air ma·πá·∏çala.

original: g-yas pa la nyin zhag bcu gnyis kyis chu'i dkyil 'khor 'dor ro //
analyzed: g-yas pa la nyin zhag bcu gnyis kyis chu'i dkyil 'khor 'dor ro //
translated: On the right, in twelve days, the water ma·πá·∏çala is traversed.

original: de bzhin du g-yon pa'i 'dab ma la nyin zhag bcu bdun gyis me'i dkyil 'khor 'dor ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du g-yon pa'i 'dab ma la nyin zhag bcu bdun gyis me'i dkyil 'khor 'dor ro //
translated: In the same way, on the left petal, in seventeen days, the fire ma·πá·∏çala is traversed.

original: g-yas pa'i 'dab ma la nyin zhag bcva brgyad kyis me'i dkyil 'khor 'dor ro //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i 'dab ma la nyin zhag bcva brgyad kyis me'i dkyil 'khor 'dor ro //
translated: On the right petal, in eighteen days, the fire ma·πá·∏çala is traversed.

original: slar yang g-yon pa'i 'dab ma la nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gsum gyis chu'i dkyil 'khor 'dor ro //
analyzed: slar yang g-yon pa'i 'dab ma la nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gsum gyis chu'i dkyil 'khor 'dor ro //
translated: Again, on the left petal, in twenty-three days, the water ma·πá·∏çala is traversed.

original: g-yas pa'i 'dab ma la nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bzhis rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'dor ro //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i 'dab ma la nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bzhis rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'dor ro //
translated: On the right petal, in twenty-four days, the wind ma·πá·∏çala is traversed.

original: slar yang g-yon pa'i 'dab ma drug la nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa dgus sa'i dkyil 'khor 'dor ro //üîΩg-yas pa la nyin zhag gsum cus nam @253a * //
analyzed: slar yang g-yon pa'i 'dab ma drug la nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa dgus sa'i dkyil 'khor 'dor ro // g-yas pa la nyin zhag gsum cus nam @253a * //
translated: Again, on the six left petals, in twenty-nine days, the earth ma·πá·∏çala is traversed.

original: mkha'i dkyil 'khor 'dor te /
analyzed: mkha'i dkyil 'khor 'dor te /
translated: On the right, in thirty days, the space ma·πá·∏çala is traversed.

original: de ltar mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i nyin zhag rnams g-yon pa dang g-yas pa la rgyu ba dang / nyin zhag sum cu po rnams kyi 'pho ba'i nyin zhag sum cus dus sbyor bcu gnyis kyi rtsa'i 'dab ma rnams la dkyil 'khor lnga yongs su 'dor ro //
analyzed: de ltar mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i nyin zhag rnams g-yon pa dang g-yas pa la rgyu ba dang / nyin zhag sum cu po rnams kyi 'pho ba'i nyin zhag sum cus dus sbyor bcu gnyis kyi rtsa'i 'dab ma rnams la dkyil 'khor lnga yongs su 'dor ro //
translated: Thus, the unequal days and nights move through the left and right nostrils, and the thirty days and nights of the transits of the thirty days and nights completely eliminate the five mandalas in the channel petals of the twelve houses.

original: de nas g-yon pa'i rtsa mi mnyam pa'i 'dab ma rnams la rgyu ba'i nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gcig dang / 'pho ba'i nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gcig gis kyang snying stobs kyi khams zad do //
analyzed: de nas g-yon pa'i rtsa mi mnyam pa'i 'dab ma rnams la rgyu ba'i nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gcig dang / 'pho ba'i nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gcig gis kyang snying stobs kyi khams zad do //
translated: Then, the thirty-one days and nights moving through the unequal channel petals of the left nostril and the thirty-one days and nights of the transits eliminate the sattva constituent.

original: g-yas pa'i rtsa la nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gnyis rgyu ba dang / 'pho ba'i nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang rdul gyi khams zad do //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i rtsa la nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gnyis rgyu ba dang / 'pho ba'i nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang rdul gyi khams zad do //
translated: The thirty-two days and nights moving through the right nostril and the thirty-two days and nights of the transits eliminate the rajas constituent.

original: de nas mi mnyam pa'i 'dab ma la rgyu ba'i nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum dang 'pho ba'i nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum gyis mun pa'i khams zad de /
analyzed: de nas mi mnyam pa'i 'dab ma la rgyu ba'i nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum dang 'pho ba'i nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum gyis mun pa'i khams zad de /
translated: Then, the thirty-three days and nights moving through the unequal channel petals and the thirty-three days and nights of the transits eliminate the tamas constituent.

original: de ltar bad kan gyi rtsa zad pa ni snying stobs kyi khams dang / mkhris pa'i rtsa zad pa ni rdul gyi khams dang / rlung gi rtsa zad pa ni mun pa'i khams zhes brjod de rgyu ba'i nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum dang 'pho ba'i nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum gyis so //
analyzed: de ltar bad kan gyi rtsa zad pa ni snying stobs kyi khams dang / mkhris pa'i rtsa zad pa ni rdul gyi khams dang / rlung gi rtsa zad pa ni mun pa'i khams zhes brjod de rgyu ba'i nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum dang 'pho ba'i nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum gyis so //
translated: Thus, the exhaustion of the phlegm channel is said to be the sattva constituent, the exhaustion of the bile channel is the rajas constituent, and the exhaustion of the wind channel is the tamas constituent.

original: khyim gnyis ka'i nyin zhag bsdus pas nyin zhag gsum gyis dman pa'i lo gsum dang / phyogs gsum gyis nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gnyis lhag pa'i brgya phrag bcu gcig tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyim gnyis ka'i nyin zhag bsdus pas nyin zhag gsum gyis dman pa'i lo gsum dang / phyogs gsum gyis nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gnyis lhag pa'i brgya phrag bcu gcig tu 'gyur ro //
translated: The sum of the days of the two houses is three years less three days, and the sum of the three directions is one hundred and eleven, with twenty-two days remaining.

original: dkyil 'khor lnga dang snying stobs dang / rdul dang mun pa'i rtsa gcod pa ni srog gi rlung gis gnas yongs su 'dor ba ste /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor lnga dang snying stobs dang / rdul dang mun pa'i rtsa gcod pa ni srog gi rlung gis gnas yongs su 'dor ba ste /
translated: The cutting of the five ma·πá·∏çalas, the sattva, rajas, and tamas channels is the life vƒÅyu‚Äôs complete abandonment of the body.

original: de ltar phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba dang ji srid lo gsum gyi nyin zhag rnams srog rgyu bas so //
analyzed: de ltar phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba dang ji srid lo gsum gyi nyin zhag rnams srog rgyu bas so //
translated: Thus, the half-months and the days of three years are the movement of the life [vƒÅyu].

original: de nas gzhan ni sum cu dag dang ste mngal bzung ba'i zla ba'i nyin zhag gi tshogs nyin zhag sum cu'i bdag nyid dang / 'tsho ba dag gi mtshan mo gsum gyi bar du g-yas pa'i rtsa la rgyu zhing 'pho ba thams cad med pas /
analyzed: de nas gzhan ni sum cu dag dang ste mngal bzung ba'i zla ba'i nyin zhag gi tshogs nyin zhag sum cu'i bdag nyid dang / 'tsho ba dag gi mtshan mo gsum gyi bar du g-yas pa'i rtsa la rgyu zhing 'pho ba thams cad med pas /
translated: Then, for another thirty days, the consciousness moves in the right channel for thirty days of the womb, with three nights of life, without all the movements.

original: nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum gyi bar du phung po dang khams rnams rnam par gcod pa ste /
analyzed: nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum gyi bar du phung po dang khams rnams rnam par gcod pa ste /
translated: For thirty-three days, the aggregates and elements are eliminated.

original: 'dir gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po lnga dang / sa la sogs pa'i khams lnga dang / lus kyi dbang po la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga dang / dri la sogs pa'i yul lnga dang / bshang lam la sogs pa'i las kyi dbang @253b po lnga dang /
analyzed: 'dir gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po lnga dang / sa la sogs pa'i khams lnga dang / lus kyi dbang po la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga dang / dri la sogs pa'i yul lnga dang / bshang lam la sogs pa'i las kyi dbang @253b po lnga dang /
translated: Here, the five aggregates such as form, the five elements such as earth, the five faculties such as the body faculty, the five objects such as smell, the five action faculties such as the anus,

original: smra ba la sogs pa'i las kyi dbang po'i yul lnga ste /
analyzed: smra ba la sogs pa'i las kyi dbang po'i yul lnga ste /
translated: and the five object fields of the action faculties such as speech

original: 'di dag rnams nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum gyis gcod cing phan tshun yang dag par sbyor ba med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di dag rnams nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum gyis gcod cing phan tshun yang dag par sbyor ba med par 'gyur ro //
translated: are eliminated by thirty-three days and do not mutually combine.

original: de nas dbugs kyi 'khor lo zad pa'i don du nyin zhag gcig dbu ma la 'jug go //
analyzed: de nas dbugs kyi 'khor lo zad pa'i don du nyin zhag gcig dbu ma la 'jug go //
translated: Then, for the purpose of exhausting the wheel of breath, one should enter the central channel for one day and night.

original: phung po drug pa dang / khams drug pa dang / dbang po drug pa dang / yul drug pa dang / las kyi dbang po drug pa dang / las kyi dbang po'i yul drug pa khu ba 'pho ba ni 'chi ba'i mthar 'gyur te /
analyzed: phung po drug pa dang / khams drug pa dang / dbang po drug pa dang / yul drug pa dang / las kyi dbang po drug pa dang / las kyi dbang po'i yul drug pa khu ba 'pho ba ni 'chi ba'i mthar 'gyur te /
translated: The six aggregates, six elements, six sense faculties, six objects, six action faculties, and six action object faculties, the emission of semen is the end of death.

original: phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnam par gcad pa'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnam par gcad pa'i nges pa'o //
translated: This is the certainty of the discrimination of the aggregates, elements, and sense bases.

original: da ni dbugs zhes pa la sogs pas skyes par gyur pa rnams kyi 'chi ba'i dbugs rgyu ba gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni dbugs zhes pa la sogs pas skyes par gyur pa rnams kyi 'chi ba'i dbugs rgyu ba gsungs te /
translated: Now, beginning with breath, he speaks of the breath at the death of those who have been born.

original: 'dir lus la dbugs kyi 'khor lo dang chu srang gi 'khor lo dang / chu tshod kyi 'khor lo dang nyin zhag gi 'khor lo ni phyi rol la ji lta ba de bzhin du lus la yang ngo //
analyzed: 'dir lus la dbugs kyi 'khor lo dang chu srang gi 'khor lo dang / chu tshod kyi 'khor lo dang nyin zhag gi 'khor lo ni phyi rol la ji lta ba de bzhin du lus la yang ngo //
translated: Here, the wheel of breath, the wheel of minutes, the wheel of hours, and the wheel of days and nights in the body are just as they are outside.

original: de la dbugs drug gi bdag nyid ni dbugs kyi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: de la dbugs drug gi bdag nyid ni dbugs kyi 'khor lo'o //
translated: There, the wheel of breath has the nature of six breaths.

original: chu srang drug cu'i bdag nyid ni chu srang gi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: chu srang drug cu'i bdag nyid ni chu srang gi 'khor lo'o //
translated: The wheel of minutes has the nature of sixty minutes.

original: chu tshod drug cu'i bdag nyid ni chu tshod kyi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: chu tshod drug cu'i bdag nyid ni chu tshod kyi 'khor lo'o //
translated: The wheel of hours has the nature of sixty hours.

original: nyin zhag stong brgyad cu'i bdag nyid ni 'chi ltas kyi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: nyin zhag stong brgyad cu'i bdag nyid ni 'chi ltas kyi 'khor lo'o //
translated: The wheel of death omens has the nature of 180 days.

original: nyin zhag lnga bcu rtsa drug lhag pa'i brgya phrag bcu gcig gi bdag nyid ni dus kyi 'chi ba'i nyin zhag gi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: nyin zhag lnga bcu rtsa drug lhag pa'i brgya phrag bcu gcig gi bdag nyid ni dus kyi 'chi ba'i nyin zhag gi 'khor lo'o //
translated: The wheel of the days of death has the nature of 116 days.

original: 'khor lo 'di rnams la 'chi ba ni dbugs kyi rang bzhin dang chu srang gi rang bzhin dang chu tshod kyi rang bzhin dang nyin zhag gi rang bzhin gyi rgyu ste /
analyzed: 'khor lo 'di rnams la 'chi ba ni dbugs kyi rang bzhin dang chu srang gi rang bzhin dang chu tshod kyi rang bzhin dang nyin zhag gi rang bzhin gyi rgyu ste /
translated: In these wheels, death is the cause of the nature of the breath, the nature of the minutes, the nature of the hours, and the nature of the days.

original: g-yon gyi rtsa dang g-yas kyi rtsa la grangs bzhin du re re lhag pas so //
analyzed: g-yon gyi rtsa dang g-yas kyi rtsa la grangs bzhin du re re lhag pas so //
translated: It is due to the left and right channels increasing by one each.

original: dang por re zhig dbugs rgyu ba ni bgrod pa'i yan lag las ni lo bdun dag gis zhes pa ste /
analyzed: dang por re zhig dbugs rgyu ba ni bgrod pa'i yan lag las ni lo bdun dag gis zhes pa ste /
translated: First, the movement of the breath is due to the branch of the path. It is said that in seven years,

original: 'dir skyes pa gang la lo brgya'i mtshams su 'chi ltas med na dus kyi 'chi ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dir skyes pa gang la lo brgya'i mtshams su 'chi ltas med na dus kyi 'chi ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Here, if a man has no sign of death at the end of a hundred years, then death by time will occur.

original: de'i bgrod pa gnyis ni g-yon pa'i rtsa dang g-yas pa'i rtsa la dkyil 'khor lnga 'bab pa can gyi srog gi rlung 'bab po //
analyzed: de'i bgrod pa gnyis ni g-yon pa'i rtsa dang g-yas pa'i rtsa la dkyil 'khor lnga 'bab pa can gyi srog gi rlung 'bab po //
translated: His two courses are the left and right channels, where the life-force wind flows in the five chakras.

original: de nas bgrod pa gsum pa la g-yon pa'i rtsa'i nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la dbugs gcig rgyu'o //
analyzed: de nas bgrod pa gsum pa la g-yon pa'i rtsa'i nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la dbugs gcig rgyu'o //
translated: Then, on the third course, one breath flows in the space chakra of the left channel.

original: bzhi pa la mi rgyu'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa la mi rgyu'o //
translated: On the fourth, it does not flow.

original: de nas lo gsum pa'i bgrod pa lnga pa la g-yas pa'i rtsa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor la dbugs gnyis rgyu'o //
analyzed: de nas lo gsum pa'i bgrod pa lnga pa la g-yas pa'i rtsa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor la dbugs gnyis rgyu'o //
translated: Then, on the fifth course of the third year, two breaths flow in the earth chakra of the right channel.

original: slar yang @254a * //
analyzed: slar yang @254a * //
translated: Again,

original: bgrod pa drug pa la mi rgyu'o //
analyzed: bgrod pa drug pa la mi rgyu'o //
translated: on the sixth course, it does not flow.

original: de nas bgrod pa bdun pa la g-yon pa'i rtsa'i nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la dbugs gsum rgyu'o //
analyzed: de nas bgrod pa bdun pa la g-yon pa'i rtsa'i nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la dbugs gsum rgyu'o //
translated: Then, on the seventh course, three breaths flow in the space chakra of the left channel.

original: brgyad pa la ma yin no //
analyzed: brgyad pa la ma yin no //
translated: On the eighth, it does not.

original: de bzhin du dgu pa la g-yas pa'i rtsa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor la gzugs bzhi rgyu'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du dgu pa la g-yas pa'i rtsa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor la gzugs bzhi rgyu'o //
translated: Likewise, on the ninth, four breaths flow in the earth chakra of the right channel.

original: bcu pa la ma yin no //
analyzed: bcu pa la ma yin no //
translated: On the tenth, it does not.

original: slar yang bcu gcig pa la g-yon gyi rtsa'i stong pa'i dkyil 'khor la dbugs lnga rgyu'o //
analyzed: slar yang bcu gcig pa la g-yon gyi rtsa'i stong pa'i dkyil 'khor la dbugs lnga rgyu'o //
translated: Again, in the eleventh [month], the five breaths move in the empty ma·πá·∏çala of the left nƒÅ·∏çƒ´.

original: bcu gnyis pa la ma yin no //
analyzed: bcu gnyis pa la ma yin no //
translated: [The breath] does not move in the twelfth [month].

original: de nas bgrod pa bcu gsum pa la g-yas pa'i rtsa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor la dbugs drug rgyu'o //
analyzed: de nas bgrod pa bcu gsum pa la g-yas pa'i rtsa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor la dbugs drug rgyu'o //
translated: Then, in the thirteenth [month], the six breaths move in the earth ma·πá·∏çala of the right nƒÅ·∏çƒ´.

original: bgrod pa bcu bzhi pa la ma yin no //
analyzed: bgrod pa bcu bzhi pa la ma yin no //
translated: [The breath] does not move in the fourteenth [month].

original: de ltar dbugs drug gis 'khor lo ste /
analyzed: de ltar dbugs drug gis 'khor lo ste /
translated: Thus, there are six breaths in the wheel.

original: de ni li bt'a'am chu srang gcig tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni li bt'a'am chu srang gcig tu 'gyur ro //
translated: That is one le‚Äôu or one water-clock unit.

original: 'di la phyed dang bcas pa'i zla bas dman pa'i lo bdun no //
analyzed: 'di la phyed dang bcas pa'i zla bas dman pa'i lo bdun no //
translated: Here, there are seven years less by one half-month.

original: mtshams 'di nas chu srang gi 'khor lo'i steng du dbugs rgyu bar mi 'gyur zhing chu srang gi dngos pos chu srang rgyu ba ni bgrod pa 'gro ba'i dbang las lo ni drug cus kyang zhes pa ste /
analyzed: mtshams 'di nas chu srang gi 'khor lo'i steng du dbugs rgyu bar mi 'gyur zhing chu srang gi dngos pos chu srang rgyu ba ni bgrod pa 'gro ba'i dbang las lo ni drug cus kyang zhes pa ste /
translated: From this juncture, the breath does not move on top of the water-clock wheel. The movement of the water-clock unit is due to the power of the movement of the stages.

original: lo bdun po de'i steng du gzhan lo drug cu ji srid par gcig gis bar du chod pa'i bgrod pa dag gis g-yon gyi rtsa'i nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la gcig la sogs pas mi mnyam pa'i chu srang rnams chu srang lnga bcu rtsa dgu'i par dang /
analyzed: lo bdun po de'i steng du gzhan lo drug cu ji srid par gcig gis bar du chod pa'i bgrod pa dag gis g-yon gyi rtsa'i nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la gcig la sogs pas mi mnyam pa'i chu srang rnams chu srang lnga bcu rtsa dgu'i par dang /
translated: For seventy years, the uneven hours, one and so forth, move on the mandala of space of the left channel, in the manner of the uneven and even yuga, for forty-nine hours.

original: g-yas kyi rtsa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor la gnyis la sogs pas mnyam pa rnams chu srang drug cu'i bar du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i dus sbyor gyi rang bzhin gyi 'dab ma drug drug la rgyu'o //
analyzed: g-yas kyi rtsa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor la gnyis la sogs pas mnyam pa rnams chu srang drug cu'i bar du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i dus sbyor gyi rang bzhin gyi 'dab ma drug drug la rgyu'o //
translated: For sixty years, the even hours, two and so forth, move on the mandala of earth of the right channel, in the manner of the uneven and even yuga, for sixty hours.

original: chu srang drug cus chu srang gi 'khor lo ste /
analyzed: chu srang drug cus chu srang gi 'khor lo ste /
translated: Sixty hours is one hour of the wheel of hours.

original: de nyid ni chu tshod gcig tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid ni chu tshod gcig tu 'gyur ro //
translated: That is one hour.

original: lo drug cu rtsa bdun gyi mtshams 'di nas 'chi ba chu tshod kyi rang bzhin gyis chu tshod rgyu ba ni zla ba gsum las sum cu'i lo yis zhes pa ste slar yang chu tshod gcig dang por byas nas g-yon gyi rtsa dang g-yas kyi rtsa la mi
analyzed: lo drug cu rtsa bdun gyi mtshams 'di nas 'chi ba chu tshod kyi rang bzhin gyis chu tshod rgyu ba ni zla ba gsum las sum cu'i lo yis zhes pa ste slar yang chu tshod gcig dang por byas nas g-yon gyi rtsa dang g-yas kyi rtsa la mi
translated: Again, beginning with one hour, the movement is in the left and right channels,

original: mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chu tshod gcig gis bar du chod pas rgyu ste /
analyzed: mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chu tshod gcig gis bar du chod pas rgyu ste /
translated: interrupted by one hour of the uneven and even [movement].

original: bgrod pa phyed  la zla ba gsum gyis g-yon gyi rtsa'i nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la chu tshod gcig rgyu'o //
analyzed: bgrod pa phyed  la zla ba gsum gyis g-yon gyi rtsa'i nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la chu tshod gcig rgyu'o //
translated: In half a circuit, in three months, one hour moves in the circle of the sky of the left channel.

original: gzhan zla ba gsum gyis ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan zla ba gsum gyis ma yin no //
translated: Not in another three months.

original: slar yang gzhan bgrod pa byed la zla ba gsum gyis g-yas kyi rtsa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor la chu tshod gnyis rgyu'o //
analyzed: slar yang gzhan bgrod pa byed la zla ba gsum gyis g-yas kyi rtsa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor la chu tshod gnyis rgyu'o //
translated: Again, in another half a circuit, in three months, two hours move in the circle of the earth of the right channel.

original: de ltar zla ba gsum gsum @254b gyis g-yon dang g-yas kyi khyim gyi 'dab ma drug drug gis nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor dang sa'i dkyil 'khor la 'chi ba'i chu tshod kyi rang bzhin gyis chu tshod drug cu po rnams rgyu'o //
analyzed: de ltar zla ba gsum gsum @254b gyis g-yon dang g-yas kyi khyim gyi 'dab ma drug drug gis nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor dang sa'i dkyil 'khor la 'chi ba'i chu tshod kyi rang bzhin gyis chu tshod drug cu po rnams rgyu'o //
translated: Thus, in three months, the sixty nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s of the nature of hours move in the circle of the sky and the circle of the earth through the six petals of the right and left houses.

original: de'i phyir phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba'i dman pa'i lo dgu bcu rtsa bdun gyi mtshams su chu tshod kyi 'khor lo rgyu ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba'i dman pa'i lo dgu bcu rtsa bdun gyi mtshams su chu tshod kyi 'khor lo rgyu ste /
translated: Therefore, at the end of ninety-seven incomplete months, the wheel of hours moves.

original: de nyid nyin zhag gcig tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid nyin zhag gcig tu 'gyur ro //
translated: That itself is one day.

original: de nas g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i rtsa la nyin zhag gi rang bzhin gyis nyin zhag gi 'khor lo sngar brjod pa'i rim pas rgyu ste /
analyzed: de nas g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i rtsa la nyin zhag gi rang bzhin gyis nyin zhag gi 'khor lo sngar brjod pa'i rim pas rgyu ste /
translated: Then, in the right and left nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s, the wheel of days moves in the nature of days, in the order previously explained.

original: de'i phyir nyin zhag bgrod pa'i dbang las dus kyi lo dang / phyogs kyis kyang zhes pa ste ;
analyzed: de'i phyir nyin zhag bgrod pa'i dbang las dus kyi lo dang / phyogs kyis kyang zhes pa ste ;
translated: Therefore, by the power of the movement of days, there is a year of time and a year of directions.

original: lo gsum dang phyogs gsum dang kyang yig gis gzhan nyin zhag sum cus kyang ngo //
analyzed: lo gsum dang phyogs gsum dang kyang yig gis gzhan nyin zhag sum cus kyang ngo //
translated: And by three years and three quarters, and by thirty days, and so on.

original: 'dir 'chi ba'i nyin zhag rgyu ba'i grangs ni dus kyi 'khor lo dag las phyed bcas sum cu gnyis kyis bgos pa'i zhes pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir 'chi ba'i nyin zhag rgyu ba'i grangs ni dus kyi 'khor lo dag las phyed bcas sum cu gnyis kyis bgos pa'i zhes pa ste /
translated: Here, the number of days of death is divided by thirty-two and a half.

original: nyi shu rtsa lnga lhag pa'i brgya phrag bcu gcig las thob pa'i nyin zhag gi tshogs ni lte ba'i mthar thug par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa lnga lhag pa'i brgya phrag bcu gcig las thob pa'i nyin zhag gi tshogs ni lte ba'i mthar thug par rig par bya'o //
translated: The total of days obtained from eleven hundred plus twenty-five should be known to be the end of the navel.

original: 'dir phyed dang bcas pa'i sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis thob pa rgyu ba'i nyin zhag sum cu rtsa bzhi dang / chu tshod sum cu rtsa drug dang / chu srang lnga bcu rtsa lnga dang / phyed dang bcas pa'i dbugs gnyis te /
analyzed: 'dir phyed dang bcas pa'i sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis thob pa rgyu ba'i nyin zhag sum cu rtsa bzhi dang / chu tshod sum cu rtsa drug dang / chu srang lnga bcu rtsa lnga dang / phyed dang bcas pa'i dbugs gnyis te /
translated: Here, the days of movement obtained by thirty-two and a half are thirty-four days, thirty-six hours, fifty-five half-breaths, and thirty-six half-breaths.

original: 'di dag las nyin zhag gcig ni lte ba la'o //
analyzed: 'di dag las nyin zhag gcig ni lte ba la'o //
translated: From these, one day is at the navel.

original: lhag ma ni g-yon dang g-yas pa'i 'chi ltas su rig par bya'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni g-yon dang g-yas pa'i 'chi ltas su rig par bya'o //
translated: The remainder should be known as the signs of death in the left and right.

original: nyin zhag so sor rgyu ba ni chu tshod lhag par 'gyur te /
analyzed: nyin zhag so sor rgyu ba ni chu tshod lhag par 'gyur te /
translated: The movement in each day increases by one hour.

original: mtha'i rgyu ba ni g-yas pa'i rtsa la'o //
analyzed: mtha'i rgyu ba ni g-yas pa'i rtsa la'o //
translated: The movement at the end is in the right channel.

original: dus kyi 'chi ba'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: dus kyi 'chi ba'i nges pa'o //
translated: The certainty of death by time.

original: da ni phyogs zhes pa la sogs pas lte ba'i 'khor lo la sogs pa'i rtsa 'chad pa gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni phyogs zhes pa la sogs pas lte ba'i 'khor lo la sogs pa'i rtsa 'chad pa gsungs te /
translated: Now, ‚Äúin the directions‚Äù and so on, he explains the channels of the navel cakra and so on.

original: 'dir lte ba la khyim gyi rtsa bcu gnyis dang dkyil 'khor drug cu 'bab par byed pa drug cu ste /
analyzed: 'dir lte ba la khyim gyi rtsa bcu gnyis dang dkyil 'khor drug cu 'bab par byed pa drug cu ste /
translated: Here, the navel has twelve channels of the houses and sixty channels that cause the sixty ma·πá·∏çalas to descend.

original: dgu yis bsnun pa'i lag 'gro zhes pa brgyad la dgu yis bsnun pa ni bdun cu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dgu yis bsnun pa'i lag 'gro zhes pa brgyad la dgu yis bsnun pa ni bdun cu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur ro //
translated: ‚Äú The channels that are struck by nine‚Äù are seventy-two, since eight are struck by nine.

original: dgu yis bsnun pa'i lag 'gro lte ba'i 'khor lo 'di las phyogs dang phyogs la rtsa ni gcod par byed do //
analyzed: dgu yis bsnun pa'i lag 'gro lte ba'i 'khor lo 'di las phyogs dang phyogs la rtsa ni gcod par byed do //
translated: ‚Äú The channels that are struck by nine‚Äù are the channels that are cut in the directions from this navel cakra.

original: 'dir phyogs ni nyin zhag bco brgyad kyis rig par bya ste /üîΩphyogs des lo gsum la g-yon gyi stong pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'bab par byed pa'i rtsa sum cu 'dor zhing g-yas kyi sa la sogs pa'i dkyil @255a * //
analyzed: 'dir phyogs ni nyin zhag bco brgyad kyis rig par bya ste / phyogs des lo gsum la g-yon gyi stong pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'bab par byed pa'i rtsa sum cu 'dor zhing g-yas kyi sa la sogs pa'i dkyil @255a * //
translated: Here, the directions should be understood as eighteen days.

original: 'khor 'bab par byed pa sum cu 'dor ro //
analyzed: 'khor 'bab par byed pa sum cu 'dor ro //
translated: By that direction, thirty channels that cause the ma·πá·∏çalas of the left, such as the empty, to descend are eliminated in three years, and thirty channels that cause the ma·πá·∏çalas of the right, such as the earth, to descend are eliminated.

original: de ltar sum cu sum cu ste phyogs drug cus srog gi rlung gis yongs su 'dor ro //
analyzed: de ltar sum cu sum cu ste phyogs drug cus srog gi rlung gis yongs su 'dor ro //
translated: Thus, by thirty in each of the six directions, the life-force wind completely abandons.

original: thams cad du dkyil 'khor gyi rtsa rnams las lo gsum gyi phyogs rnams kyis drug gis cha shas yongs su dor nas dkyil 'khor lnga 'bab par byed pa 'dor ro //
analyzed: thams cad du dkyil 'khor gyi rtsa rnams las lo gsum gyi phyogs rnams kyis drug gis cha shas yongs su dor nas dkyil 'khor lnga 'bab par byed pa 'dor ro //
translated: In all the channel cakras, by the three-month directions, six parts are completely abandoned and the five cakras are abandoned.

original: las kyi 'khor lo bya ba zhes pa'i tshigs las nyin zhag rtse mo can gyis rtsa ni re re 'dor zhes pa las 'dir lus la las kyi 'khor lo ni lag pa dag gi tshigs drug dang rkang pa dag gi tshigs drug po rnams la zla ba bcu
analyzed: las kyi 'khor lo bya ba zhes pa'i tshigs las nyin zhag rtse mo can gyis rtsa ni re re 'dor zhes pa las 'dir lus la las kyi 'khor lo ni lag pa dag gi tshigs drug dang rkang pa dag gi tshigs drug po rnams la zla ba bcu
translated: In the verse ‚ÄúIn the action of the action cakra, the day-and-night channel is abandoned,‚Äù here, in the body, the action cakra is the six joints of the arms and the six joints of the legs.

original: gnyis kyi dbye ba las bcu gnyis kyi dbye bas tha dad pa'i 'khor lo bcu gnyis kyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: gnyis kyi dbye ba las bcu gnyis kyi dbye bas tha dad pa'i 'khor lo bcu gnyis kyi bdag nyid do //
translated: By the division of twelve months, it is the nature of twelve cakras, differentiated by the division of twelve.

original: tshigs kyi 'khor lo so so la rtsa sum cu ste tshigs bcu gnyis po rnams la rtsa sum brgya drug cu'o //
analyzed: tshigs kyi 'khor lo so so la rtsa sum cu ste tshigs bcu gnyis po rnams la rtsa sum brgya drug cu'o //
translated: In each joint cakra, there are thirty channels, and in the twelve joints, there are three hundred and sixty channels.

original: de rnams las g-yas pa'i phrag pa dang dpung pa'i tshigs pa la chu srin gyi tshes grangs sum cu'i dbye bas rtsa sum cu'o //
analyzed: de rnams las g-yas pa'i phrag pa dang dpung pa'i tshigs pa la chu srin gyi tshes grangs sum cu'i dbye bas rtsa sum cu'o //
translated: In the right shoulder and upper arm there are thirty channels, divided into the thirty days of the Makara month.

original: g-yon pa'i phrag pa dang dpung pa'i tshigs la dbo'i zla ba'i tshes grangs sum cu'i dbye bas rtsa sum cu'o //üîΩde bzhin du g-yas pa'i nye ba'i dpung pa'i tshigs la nag pa'i zla ba'i rtsa rnams so //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i phrag pa dang dpung pa'i tshigs la dbo'i zla ba'i tshes grangs sum cu'i dbye bas rtsa sum cu'o // de bzhin du g-yas pa'i nye ba'i dpung pa'i tshigs la nag pa'i zla ba'i rtsa rnams so //
translated: In the left shoulder and upper arm there are thirty channels, divided into the thirty days of the Kumbha month.

original: g-yon pa'i nye ba'i dpung pa'i tshigs las ga'i zla ba'i rtsa rnams so //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i nye ba'i dpung pa'i tshigs las ga'i zla ba'i rtsa rnams so //
translated: In the right forearm there are the channels of the PhƒÅlguna month.üîΩIn the left forearm there are the channels of the Caitra month.

original: g-yas pa'i lag pa dang nye ba'i dpung pa'i tshigs la snon gyi zla ba'i rtsa rnams so //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i lag pa dang nye ba'i dpung pa'i tshigs la snon gyi zla ba'i rtsa rnams so //
translated: In the right hand and lower arm there are the channels of the Vai≈õƒÅkha month.

original: g-yon pa'i lag pa dang nye ba'i dpung ba'i tshigs la chu stod kyi zla ba'i tshes grangs sum cu'i dbye bas rtsa sum cu ste lag pa dag gi tshigs drug gi las kyi 'khor lo rnam pa drug la rtsa brgyad cu lhag pa'i brgya'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i lag pa dang nye ba'i dpung ba'i tshigs la chu stod kyi zla ba'i tshes grangs sum cu'i dbye bas rtsa sum cu ste lag pa dag gi tshigs drug gi las kyi 'khor lo rnam pa drug la rtsa brgyad cu lhag pa'i brgya'o //
translated: In the left hand and lower arm there are thirty channels, divided into the thirty days of the Jye·π£·π≠ha month. Thus, in the six joints of the two arms there are one hundred and eighty channels, in six sections of the wheel of activity.

original: de nas g-yas pa'i brla dang dpyi'i tshigs la gro bzhin gyi zla ba'i tshes sum cu'i dbye bas rtsa sum cu'o //üîΩg-yon pa'i brla dang dpyi'i tshigs la khrums kyi zla ba'i rtsa sum cu'o //üîΩde bzhin du g-yas pa'i brla dang byin pa'i tshigs la tha skar gyi zla ba'i rtsa sum cu'o //
analyzed: de nas g-yas pa'i brla dang dpyi'i tshigs la gro bzhin gyi zla ba'i tshes sum cu'i dbye bas rtsa sum cu'o // g-yon pa'i brla dang dpyi'i tshigs la khrums kyi zla ba'i rtsa sum cu'o // de bzhin du g-yas pa'i brla dang byin pa'i tshigs la tha skar gyi zla ba'i rtsa sum cu'o //
translated: Then, in the right thigh and knee, there are thirty channels, divided into the thirty days of the month of Magha.üîΩIn the left thigh and knee, there are thirty channels of the month of PhƒÅlguna.üîΩIn the right thigh and knee, there are thirty channels of the month of Caitra.üîΩIn the left thigh and knee, there are thirty channels of the month of Vai≈õƒÅkha.

original: g-yon pa'i brla dang byin pa'i tshigs la smin drug gi zla ba'i rtsa sum cu'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i brla dang byin pa'i tshigs la smin drug gi zla ba'i rtsa sum cu'o //
translated: In the right leg and ankle, there are thirty channels of the month of Jye·π£·π≠ha.

original: g-yas pa'i rkang pa dang byin pa'i tshigs la mgo'i zla ba'i rtsa sum cu'o //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i rkang pa dang byin pa'i tshigs la mgo'i zla ba'i rtsa sum cu'o //
translated: In the left leg and ankle, there are thirty channels of the month of ƒÄ·π£ƒÅ·∏çha.

original: g-yon pa'i rkang pa dang byin pa'i tshigs la rgyal gyi zla ba'i tshes sum cu'i rang bzhin can gyi rtsa sum cu ste de ltar rkang pa dag gi tshigs drug gi las kyi 'khor lo la rtsa @255b brgyad cu lhag pa'i brgya'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i rkang pa dang byin pa'i tshigs la rgyal gyi zla ba'i tshes sum cu'i rang bzhin can gyi rtsa sum cu ste de ltar rkang pa dag gi tshigs drug gi las kyi 'khor lo la rtsa @255b brgyad cu lhag pa'i brgya'o //
translated: Thus, in the six joints of the legs, there are one hundred and eighty channels in the karma cakra.

original: las kyi dbang po'i bya ba 'jug pa'i dang por gyur pa'i phyir las kyi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: las kyi dbang po'i bya ba 'jug pa'i dang por gyur pa'i phyir las kyi 'khor lo'o //
