translated: The wheel of karma is so called because it is the first of the activities of the organ of action.

original: rtsa 'di dag las nyin zhag rtse mo can gyis te so sor nyin zhag gsum gsum gyis rgyu ba las lo gsum gyi nyin zhag brgyad cu lhag pa'i stong gi grangs 'di rnams kyis rtsa sum brgya drug cu srog gi rlung gis 'dor ro //
analyzed: rtsa 'di dag las nyin zhag rtse mo can gyis te so sor nyin zhag gsum gsum gyis rgyu ba las lo gsum gyi nyin zhag brgyad cu lhag pa'i stong gi grangs 'di rnams kyis rtsa sum brgya drug cu srog gi rlung gis 'dor ro //
translated: From among these channels, the prƒÅ·πáa wind expels the three hundred and sixty channels in the number of days of three years plus one hundred and twenty days, by moving in three days and nights each.

original: bya ba zhes pa'i zhes pa ni len pa dang 'gro ba la sogs pa'i bya ba byed pa'i phyir bya ba zhes pa ste /
analyzed: bya ba zhes pa'i zhes pa ni len pa dang 'gro ba la sogs pa'i bya ba byed pa'i phyir bya ba zhes pa ste /
translated: The word ‚Äúactivity‚Äù is so called because it performs the activities of taking, going, and so on.

original: lag pa dang rkang pa'i sor mo'i tshigs drug cu rnams la rtsa drug gi bdag nyid kyi 'khor lo ste /
analyzed: lag pa dang rkang pa'i sor mo'i tshigs drug cu rnams la rtsa drug gi bdag nyid kyi 'khor lo ste /
translated: There are wheels with the nature of sixty channels in the sixty joints of the fingers and toes.

original: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang stong pa dang ye shes kyi rtsa'i rang bzhin can gyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang stong pa dang ye shes kyi rtsa'i rang bzhin can gyi bdag nyid do //
translated: They have the nature of the earth, water, fire, wind, space, and gnosis channels.

original: tshigs so so la gnas pa ni rtsa drug gi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: tshigs so so la gnas pa ni rtsa drug gi bdag nyid do //
translated: Each joint has the nature of six channels.

original: tshigs drug cu po rnams la rtsa sum brgya drug cu'o //
analyzed: tshigs drug cu po rnams la rtsa sum brgya drug cu'o //
translated: There are 360 channels in the 60 joints.

original: de dag las rtsa so so ni nyin zhag gsum gsum gyis yongs su 'dor te las kyi 'khor lo la ji lta ba bzhin no //
analyzed: de dag las rtsa so so ni nyin zhag gsum gsum gyis yongs su 'dor te las kyi 'khor lo la ji lta ba bzhin no //
translated: From those, each day, 3 channels are eliminated, just as in the wheel of karma.

original: gang gi tshe g-yas pa'i lag pa dang nye ba'i dpung ba'i tshigs pa la rtsa sum cu 'dor ba de'i tshe lag pa g-yas kyi sor mo lnga'i steng rnams su rtsa drug drug 'dor te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe g-yas pa'i lag pa dang nye ba'i dpung ba'i tshigs pa la rtsa sum cu 'dor ba de'i tshe lag pa g-yas kyi sor mo lnga'i steng rnams su rtsa drug drug 'dor te /
translated: When 30 channels are eliminated in the joints of the right arm and shoulder, then 6 channels are eliminated in the upper parts of the 5 fingers of the right hand.

original: de ltar zla ba'i nyin zhag tshes rnams kyis sor mo lnga po rnams la rtsa sum cu 'dor ro //
analyzed: de ltar zla ba'i nyin zhag tshes rnams kyis sor mo lnga po rnams la rtsa sum cu 'dor ro //
translated: In that way, the 30 channels of the 5 fingers are eliminated by the lunar days of the month.

original: g-yon pa la yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa la yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o //
translated: The same should be understood for the left.

original: gang gi tshe g-yas pa'i dpung pa dang nye ba'i dpung pa'i tshigs la 'dor ba de'i tshe sor mo'i tshigs dbu ma'i mtshams rnams la rtsa sum cu 'dor ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe g-yas pa'i dpung pa dang nye ba'i dpung pa'i tshigs la 'dor ba de'i tshe sor mo'i tshigs dbu ma'i mtshams rnams la rtsa sum cu 'dor ro //
translated: When 30 channels are eliminated in the joints of the right shoulder and upper arm, then 30 channels are eliminated in the middle joints of the fingers.

original: g-yon pa la yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: g-yon pa la yang de bzhin no //
translated: The same is true for the left.

original: gang gi tshe g-yas pa'i phrag pa dang dpung pa'i tshigs la 'dor ba de'i tshe sor mo'i 'og gi tshigs kyi mtshams rnams la nyin zhag dgu bcus rtsa sum cu 'dor ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe g-yas pa'i phrag pa dang dpung pa'i tshigs la 'dor ba de'i tshe sor mo'i 'og gi tshigs kyi mtshams rnams la nyin zhag dgu bcus rtsa sum cu 'dor ro //
translated: When the right shoulder and arm are crossed, thirty nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s are crossed at the joints of the fingers, in ninety days.

original: g-yon pa la yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa la yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that the same is true for the left.

original: gang gi tshe g-yas pa'i rkang pa dang byin pa'i tshigs la rtsa sum cu 'dor ba de'i tshe rkang pa g-yas pa'i sor mo'i steng gi tshigs kyi mtshams rnams la nyin zhag dgu bcus rtsa sum cu 'dor ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe g-yas pa'i rkang pa dang byin pa'i tshigs la rtsa sum cu 'dor ba de'i tshe rkang pa g-yas pa'i sor mo'i steng gi tshigs kyi mtshams rnams la nyin zhag dgu bcus rtsa sum cu 'dor ro //
translated: When thirty nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s are crossed at the knee and thigh of the right leg, thirty nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s are crossed at the joints of the fingers of the right leg in ninety days.

original: g-yon pa la yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: g-yon pa la yang de bzhin no //
translated: It should be understood that the same is true for the left.

original: gang gi tshe g-yas pa'i byin pa dang brla'i tshigs la 'dor ba de'i tshe sor mo'i dbu ma'i tshigs kyi mtshams rnams la rtsa sum cu 'dor ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe g-yas pa'i byin pa dang brla'i tshigs la 'dor ba de'i tshe sor mo'i dbu ma'i tshigs kyi mtshams rnams la rtsa sum cu 'dor ro //
translated: When thirty nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s are crossed at the thigh and calf of the right leg, thirty nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s are crossed at the joints of the middle fingers in ninety days.

original: rkang pa g-yon pa la yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //üîΩgang gi tshe g-yas pa'i dpyi dang @256a * //
analyzed: rkang pa g-yon pa la yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //üîΩgang gi tshe g-yas pa'i dpyi dang @256a * //
translated: It should be understood that the same is true for the left leg.üîΩWhen the right hip and buttock are crossed, thirty nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s are crossed at the joints of the middle fingers in ninety days.

original: g-yon pa la yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa la yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand it in the same way for the left [leg].

translated: Now, the syllables of the supreme deities of the channels will be explained. Here, on the left shoulder and upper arm joints, the ka class [is placed] in reverse order, divided by the short vowels of ƒÅkƒÅ≈õa and so on.

analyzed: de bzhin du g-yas pa'i phrag pa dang dpung pa'i tshigs la ye shes la sogs pa'i dbyangs ring pos phye ba'i ka sde'o //

analyzed: g-yon pa'i lag pa dang nye ba'i dpung pa'i tshigs la nam mkha' la sogs pa'i dbyangs drug gis phye ba'i ta sde'o //

analyzed: g-yas pa la ye shes la sogs pa'i dbyangs kyis phye ba'o //

analyzed: de ltar byang du bgrod pa la zla ba drug go //
translated: Thus, there are six months of progress to the north.

original: de nas lho la g-yas pa'i dpyi dang brla'i tshigs la ye shes la sogs pa'i dbyangs ring po drug gis phye ba'i pa sde'o //
analyzed: de nas lho la g-yas pa'i dpyi dang brla'i tshigs la ye shes la sogs pa'i dbyangs ring po drug gis phye ba'i pa sde'o //

translated: The six short vowels beginning with a are in the left hip and the knee.üîΩSimilarly, the six long vowels beginning with j√±ƒÅ are in the right calf and the ankle.

analyzed: de bzhin du g-yas pa'i rkang pa dang byin pa'i tshigs la ye shes la sogs pa'i dbyangs ring po drug gis phye ba'i sa sde'o //
translated: Likewise, on the right foot and ankle, the earth group is divided by the six long vowels such as ·πõ, and so on.

analyzed: g-yon pa la nam mkha' la sogs pa'i dbyangs thung  ngus phye ba ste nam mkha'i gsal byed la sogs pa lugs las bzlog pas so //
translated: On the left, the space group is divided by the six short vowels such as a, and so on, in reverse order, beginning with the space group.

original: de ltar ring po dang / thung ngu'i dbye bas sde pa so so la yi ge sum cu'i bdag nyid ni las kyi 'khor lo'i 'khor lo bcu gnyis kyi rtsibs sum cu po rnams la'o //
analyzed: de ltar ring po dang / thung ngu'i dbye bas sde pa so so la yi ge sum cu'i bdag nyid ni las kyi 'khor lo'i 'khor lo bcu gnyis kyi rtsibs sum cu po rnams la'o //
translated: Thus, the individual groups, divided into long and short, are on the thirty spokes of the twelve-spoked karmacakra.

translated: Then, on the right thumb and so on, the individual gutturals such as ka, and so on, are divided by the six long vowels such as ·πõ, and so on.

translated: The letter ka, which is the nature of the six nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s at the base of the thumb, is divided by the long vowels, such as ·πõ, and so on.

analyzed: mdzub mo'i tshigs la kha yig go // gung mo'i tshigs la @256b ga yig go //
translated: The letter kha is at the joint of the index finger.üîΩThe letter ga is at the joint of the middle finger.

analyzed: ming med kyi tshigs la gha yig go // mthe'u chung gi tshigs la ye shes la sogs pa'i dbyangs ring po drug gis phye ba'i nga yig go //
translated: The letter gha is at the joint of the ring finger.üîΩThe letter ·πÖa is divided by the six long vowels, such as ·πõ, and so on, at the joint of the base of the little finger.

original: g-yon pa'i mthe'u chung gi 'og gi tshigs kyi mtshams la nam mkha' la sogs pa'i dbyangs thung ngus phye ba'i nga yig go //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i mthe'u chung gi 'og gi tshigs kyi mtshams la nam mkha' la sogs pa'i dbyangs thung ngus phye ba'i nga yig go //
translated: The letter ·πÖa, which is divided by the six short vowels, such as ·πõ, and so on, is at the joint of the base of the left little finger.

original: ming med kyi tshigs la gha yig go //üîΩgung mo'i tshigs la ga yig go //
analyzed: ming med kyi tshigs la gha yig go // gung mo'i tshigs la ga yig go //
translated: The letter ·πáa is at the joint of the ring finger.üîΩThe letter ta is at the joint of the middle finger.

original: mdzub mo'i tshigs la kha yig go //
analyzed: mdzub mo'i tshigs la kha yig go //
translated: The letter tha is at the joint of the index finger.

original: mthe bo'i tshigs la nam mkha' la sogs pa'i dbyangs thung ngu drug gis phye ba'i ka yig go //
analyzed: mthe bo'i tshigs la nam mkha' la sogs pa'i dbyangs thung ngu drug gis phye ba'i ka yig go //
translated: The letter ·∏ça is at the joint of the thumb, which is divided by the six short vowels, such as ·πõ, and so on.

original: de bzhin du g-yas pa'i mthe bo la sogs pa'i tshigs kyi phreng ba gnyis pa la dbyangs ring pos phye ba'i tsa sde 'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du g-yas pa'i mthe bo la sogs pa'i tshigs kyi phreng ba gnyis pa la dbyangs ring pos phye ba'i tsa sde 'o //
translated: Likewise, on the second row of joints of the right foot, the ca class is differentiated by long vowels.

original: g-yon pa la dbyangs thung  ngus phye ba'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa la dbyangs thung  ngus phye ba'o //
translated: On the left, it is differentiated by short vowels.

original: de bzhin du g-yas pa'i tshigs kyi phreng ba gsum pa la dbyangs ring pos phye ba'i ta sde'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du g-yas pa'i tshigs kyi phreng ba gsum pa la dbyangs ring pos phye ba'i ta sde'o //
translated: Likewise, on the third row of joints of the right foot, the ta class is differentiated by long vowels.

original: g-yon pa la dbyangs thung  ngus phye ba'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa la dbyangs thung  ngus phye ba'o //
translated: On the left, it is differentiated by short vowels.

original: de bzhin du g-yas pa'i rkang pa'i sor mo'i tshigs rnams la dbyangs ring pos phye ba'i pa sde'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du g-yas pa'i rkang pa'i sor mo'i tshigs rnams la dbyangs ring pos phye ba'i pa sde'o //
translated: Likewise, on the joints of the toes of the right foot, the pa class is differentiated by long vowels.

original: g-yon pa la dbyangs thung ngus phye ba'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa la dbyangs thung ngus phye ba'o //

original: g-yas pa'i tshigs dbu ma rnams la dbyangs ring pos phye ba'i ta sde'o //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i tshigs dbu ma rnams la dbyangs ring pos phye ba'i ta sde'o //
translated: On the middle joints of the right foot, the ta class is differentiated by long vowels.

original: g-yon pa la nam mkha' la sogs pa'i dbyangs thung ngus phye ba'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa la nam mkha' la sogs pa'i dbyangs thung ngus phye ba'o //
translated: On the left, it is differentiated by short vowels such as the sky.

original: g-yas pa'i steng gi tshigs kyi mtshams rnams la dbyangs ring pos phye ba'i sa sde'o //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i steng gi tshigs kyi mtshams rnams la dbyangs ring pos phye ba'i sa sde'o //
translated: On the upper joints of the right foot, the sa class is differentiated by long vowels.

original: g-yon pa'i sor mo'i tshigs kyi mtshams rnams la nam mkha' la sogs pa'i dbyangs drug gis phye ba'i lugs las bzlog pas so zhes pa ni lo dang po la ste /
analyzed: g-yon pa'i sor mo'i tshigs kyi mtshams rnams la nam mkha' la sogs pa'i dbyangs drug gis phye ba'i lugs las bzlog pas so zhes pa ni lo dang po la ste /
translated: The six vowels such as a·∏• are divided by the reverse order of the joints of the left fingers.

original: gnyis pa la yon tan dang 'phel bas phye ba dang / gsum pa la ya na ra bsgyur ba la sogs pas phye ba'i sde pa drug go //
analyzed: gnyis pa la yon tan dang 'phel bas phye ba dang / gsum pa la ya na ra bsgyur ba la sogs pas phye ba'i sde pa drug go //
translated: This is for the first year. For the second year, there are six divisions by the increase of the qualities, and for the third year, there are six divisions by the change of ya, and so on.

original: 'di ni rgyas par 'chad par 'gyur ba las brjod par bya ste 'dir ma spros so ;üîΩ/ mgrin pa dag las rgyu skar rtsa ni nyin dang nyin la zla ba'i nang du rim pas 'dor ba ste zhes pa ni mgrin pa'i 'khor lo las rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi rtsa de dag dbyangs kyi bdag nyid kyi nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa brgyad
analyzed: 'di ni rgyas par 'chad par 'gyur ba las brjod par bya ste 'dir ma spros so ; / mgrin pa dag las rgyu skar rtsa ni nyin dang nyin la zla ba'i nang du rim pas 'dor ba ste zhes pa ni mgrin pa'i 'khor lo las rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi rtsa de dag dbyangs kyi bdag nyid kyi nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa brgyad
translated: This will be explained extensively later and is not elaborated here.

original: kyis 'dor ro //
analyzed: kyis 'dor ro //
translated: ‚ÄúThe lunar-day nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s of the nak·π£atras are sequentially eliminated in the throat on each day within the month‚Äù means that the nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s of the twenty-eight lunar mansions are eliminated by the twenty-eight days of the vowels.

original: thig ler gnas pa ste dpral bar gnas pa zla ba'i rkang pa rtsa bcu bzhi'i bdag nyid ni dbyangs shin tu ring po bcu bzhi'i nyin zhag bcu bzhis phyogs kyi nang du 'dor ro //
analyzed: thig ler gnas pa ste dpral bar gnas pa zla ba'i rkang pa rtsa bcu bzhi'i bdag nyid ni dbyangs shin tu ring po bcu bzhi'i nyin zhag bcu bzhis phyogs kyi nang du 'dor ro //
translated: The one abiding in the bindu, that is, abiding in the forehead, is the one with the nature of fourteen lunar digits, that is, fourteen long vowels, which are cast into the directions by the fourteen days of the bright fortnight.

original: gza'i rtsa ni yul dang snying stobs la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi nyin zhag brgyad kyis 'dor ro //
analyzed: gza'i rtsa ni yul dang snying stobs la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi nyin zhag brgyad kyis 'dor ro //
translated: The lunar channels are cast by the eight days of the qualities of sattva, rajas, and so on.

original: gsang bar gnas pa gsal byed sum cu'i bdag nyid kyi rtsa rnams ni dus kyi 'chi bas 'dor te rtsa gcod pa'i @257a * //
analyzed: gsang bar gnas pa gsal byed sum cu'i bdag nyid kyi rtsa rnams ni dus kyi 'chi bas 'dor te rtsa gcod pa'i @257a * //
translated: The one abiding in the secret place, that is, the channels with the nature of thirty consonants, are cast by the death of time, that is, by the cutting of the channels.

original: nges pa'o // da ni sde pa zhes pa la sogs pas las kyi 'khor lo la rtsa rnams nyi ma'i rang bzhin gyis srog gi rim pa dang rim pa ma yin pas gcod pa sde pa'i ming rnams kyis gsungs te /
analyzed: nges pa'o // da ni sde pa zhes pa la sogs pas las kyi 'khor lo la rtsa rnams nyi ma'i rang bzhin gyis srog gi rim pa dang rim pa ma yin pas gcod pa sde pa'i ming rnams kyis gsungs te /
translated: Now, beginning from ‚ÄúThe houses,‚Äù he explains the cutting of the channels by the life-force in the houses, which are of the nature of the sun, by the sequence and nonsequence of the houses.

original: 'dir las kyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa la rkang pa dang / lag pa'i tshigs bcu gnyis po rnams la so sor rtsa sum cu'i bdag nyid kyi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: 'dir las kyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa la rkang pa dang / lag pa'i tshigs bcu gnyis po rnams la so sor rtsa sum cu'i bdag nyid kyi 'khor lo'o //
translated: Here, the twelve spokes of the wheel of action are the twelve joints of the feet and hands, each of which is a wheel with the nature of thirty channels.üîΩThe twelve wheels are endowed with the thirty-two extra deities of the lunar days of the lips and so on.

original: mchu'i zla ba la sogs pa'i tshes sum cu'i lhag pa'i lha dang ldan pa'i 'khor lo bcu gnyis po de dag las g-yas pa'i lag pa dang rkang pa'i tshigs drug la rnam par bcad pa la sogs pa dbyangs ring po drug gis phye ba'i ka la sogs pa'i
analyzed: mchu'i zla ba la sogs pa'i tshes sum cu'i lhag pa'i lha dang ldan pa'i 'khor lo bcu gnyis po de dag las g-yas pa'i lag pa dang rkang pa'i tshigs drug la rnam par bcad pa la sogs pa dbyangs ring po drug gis phye ba'i ka la sogs pa'i
translated: From among those twelve wheels, the six joints of the right hand and foot are the six long vowels such as ·πõ, which are divided into the six groups such as ka.

original: sde pa drug gsal byed kyi chos kyis sdud pa'i rim pas so //
analyzed: sde pa drug gsal byed kyi chos kyis sdud pa'i rim pas so //
translated: The six groups are the phonemes of the consonants that are gathered in the order of the elements.üîΩSimilarly, the six wheels of the joints of the left hand and foot are the six short vowels such as a, which are divided into the six groups such as ·πáa.

original: de bzhin du g-yon pa'i lag pa dang rkang pa dag gi tshigs kyi 'khor lo drug la nam mkha' la sogs pa'i dbyangs thung ngu'i dbye bas phye ba'i sde pa drug nam mkha' la sogs pa'i gsal byed kyi chos kyis skyed pa'i rim pa ste so sor sdud
analyzed: de bzhin du g-yon pa'i lag pa dang rkang pa dag gi tshigs kyi 'khor lo drug la nam mkha' la sogs pa'i dbyangs thung ngu'i dbye bas phye ba'i sde pa drug nam mkha' la sogs pa'i gsal byed kyi chos kyis skyed pa'i rim pa ste so sor sdud
translated: The six groups are the phonemes of the consonants that are generated in the order of the elements such as space.

original: pa'i brjod pa nga yig la sogs pas so //üîΩsde pa'i dbyangs dang bcas pa de dag rnams las nyin mor byed pa srog gi rlung 'chi ba dang lhan cig khyim gyi dbye bas bgrod par rgyu ba ste zhes pa la bgrod pa ni dang po byang du bgrod pa ste chu srin la sogs pa dang mchu'i
analyzed: pa'i brjod pa nga yig la sogs pas so // sde pa'i dbyangs dang bcas pa de dag rnams las nyin mor byed pa srog gi rlung 'chi ba dang lhan cig khyim gyi dbye bas bgrod par rgyu ba ste zhes pa la bgrod pa ni dang po byang du bgrod pa ste chu srin la sogs pa dang mchu'i
translated: The vowels are a, ƒÅ, i, ƒ´, u, ≈´, ·πõ, ·πù, ·∏∑, ·∏π, e, ai, o, au, a·πÉ, a·∏•.üîΩFrom those, the life-force wind, the sun, moves in the day, together with death, through the divisions of the houses.

original: zla ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zla ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The movement is the first movement to the north, beginning with Capricorn and ending with Cancer.

original: bgrod pa de nyid lag pa g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i tshigs kyi 'khor lo drug po rnams la rgyu'o //
analyzed: bgrod pa de nyid lag pa g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i tshigs kyi 'khor lo drug po rnams la rgyu'o //
translated: That movement moves through the six channel-wheels of the right and left arms.

original: de bzhin du bya ba'i 'khor lo la lag pa'i sor mo'i tshigs kyi mtshams kyi 'khor lo rtsa drug gi bdag nyid can sum cu po rnams kyi sor mo'i tshigs kyi 'khor lo so so re re la ka la sogs pa'i gsal byed rnams te /
analyzed: de bzhin du bya ba'i 'khor lo la lag pa'i sor mo'i tshigs kyi mtshams kyi 'khor lo rtsa drug gi bdag nyid can sum cu po rnams kyi sor mo'i tshigs kyi 'khor lo so so re re la ka la sogs pa'i gsal byed rnams te /
translated: Similarly, in the action wheel, in the channel-wheels at the joints of the fingers and toes, there are thirty channels, each with six joints.

original: lag pa g-yas pa'i sor mo'i tshigs kyi mtshams kyi 'khor lo rnams pa dbyangs ring po drug gis phye ba rnams sdud pa'i rim pas rgyu'o //
analyzed: lag pa g-yas pa'i sor mo'i tshigs kyi mtshams kyi 'khor lo rnams pa dbyangs ring po drug gis phye ba rnams sdud pa'i rim pas rgyu'o //
translated: The wheels at the joints of the fingers of the right hand are divided by the six long vowels, and they are generated in the order of the reverse sequence.

original: g-yon pa la nam mkha' la sogs pa'i gsal byed rnam mkha' la sogs pa'i dbyangs kyis phye ba rnams skyed pa'i rim pas so //
analyzed: g-yon pa la nam mkha' la sogs pa'i gsal byed rnam mkha' la sogs pa'i dbyangs kyis phye ba rnams skyed pa'i rim pas so //
translated: The wheels at the joints of the fingers of the left hand are divided by the vowels of the sky family, and so forth, and they are generated in the order of the forward sequence.

original: de bzhin du lhor bgrod pa la las kyi zhes bya ba rkang pa gnyis kyi tshigs kyi 'khor lo drug po rnams dang bya ba zhes bya ba sor mo'i tshigs rnams la'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du lhor bgrod pa la las kyi zhes bya ba rkang pa gnyis kyi tshigs kyi 'khor lo drug po rnams dang bya ba zhes bya ba sor mo'i tshigs rnams la'o //
translated: Similarly, in the southern course, the six wheels at the joints of the two feet are divided by the six long vowels, and the joints of the fingers are divided by the six short vowels.

original: 'dir mchu'i zla ba dang chu @257b srin gyi 'pho ba la tshes kyi dbye bas zla ba dang 'pho ba'i gza'i dbye bas nyi ma rgyu bar shes par bya'o //üîΩgang du nyi ma 'phel ba der zla ba 'grib bo //
analyzed: 'dir mchu'i zla ba dang chu @257b srin gyi 'pho ba la tshes kyi dbye bas zla ba dang 'pho ba'i gza'i dbye bas nyi ma rgyu bar shes par bya'o // gang du nyi ma 'phel ba der zla ba 'grib bo //
translated: Here, the movement of the moon and the movement of the sun should be understood by the division of the lunar mansions and the division of the zodiacal signs, respectively.üîΩWhere the sun increases, the moon decreases.

original: gang du zla ba 'phel ba der nyi ma 'grib bo //
analyzed: gang du zla ba 'phel ba der nyi ma 'grib bo //
translated: Where the moon increases, the sun decreases.

original: 'di ltar chu srin la sogs pa la nyi ma 'phel te g-yas kyi phrag pa dang dpung pa'i tshigs kyi 'khor lo chu srin gyi rtsa sum cu'i bdag nyid rnams la ka la sogs pa dbyangs ring pos phye ba sum cu rnams ming gi chos can dang srog

translated: Thus, the sun increases in the crocodile and so on. In the crocodile channel, which is the nature of thirty spokes in the wheel of the shoulder and elbow joints of the right arm, the thirty vowels beginning with ka are divided by the long vowels.

original: dbyar gyi dus su ka rka @260b ta dang seng ge la g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i rkang pa'i tshigs kyi rtsa sum cu po rnams la snga ma bzhin du 'phel ba dang yon tan dang bcas pa'i yi ge sum cu po rnams las pa sde'i yi ge rnamsüîΩrgyu'o // ston la 'phel ba dang yon tan dang ldan pa'i ta sde'i yi ge rnams dang zla ba rgyu'o //
analyzed: dbyar gyi dus su ka rka @260b ta dang seng ge la g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i rkang pa'i tshigs kyi rtsa sum cu po rnams la snga ma bzhin du 'phel ba dang yon tan dang bcas pa'i yi ge sum cu po rnams las pa sde'i yi ge rnams rgyu'o // ston la 'phel ba dang yon tan dang ldan pa'i ta sde'i yi ge rnams dang zla ba rgyu'o //
translated: In the summer season, the thirty syllables of the ka, ca, ·π≠a, and ta classes, along with the qualities of increase, move in the thirty channels of the joints of the right and left legs, as before.üîΩIn autumn, the syllables of the ta class, along with the qualities of increase, move, along with the moon.

original: dgun stod la  sa sde'i yi ge rnams sdud pa dang skyed pa'i rim pas so //
analyzed: dgun stod la  sa sde'i yi ge rnams sdud pa dang skyed pa'i rim pas so //
translated: In the first winter month, the syllables of the pa class move, and the syllables of the ya class are generated and gathered.

original: de ltar lo gnyis pa la dbyangs sum brgya drug cu dang zla ba dang nyi ma dag rgyu'o //
analyzed: de ltar lo gnyis pa la dbyangs sum brgya drug cu dang zla ba dang nyi ma dag rgyu'o //
translated: Thus, in the second year, the three hundred sixty vowels and the sun and moon move.

original: de nas lo gsum pa la mun pa'i dbye bas ka la sogs pa'i sde pa dbyangs dang bcas pa las nyi ma dang lhan cig dus rgyu'o //
analyzed: de nas lo gsum pa la mun pa'i dbye bas ka la sogs pa'i sde pa dbyangs dang bcas pa las nyi ma dang lhan cig dus rgyu'o //
translated: Then, in the third year, the sun moves with the time of the ka and so on, along with the vowels, by the division of darkness.

original: 'dir ya nara bsgyur ba rnams ni dbyangs zhes brjod de de dag dang lhan cig yi ge sum cu sum cu rnams mun pa'i yul gyi dus rgyu ste snga ma bzhin du lag pa dang rkang pa'i tshigs rnams kyi las kyi 'khor lo dang bya ba'i 'khor loüîΩla yang sdud pa dang skyed pa'i dbye bas so //üîΩkk+h'a: kkl'a kkw'a kk+r'a kk+y'a kk+h'a zhes pa ni sa la chu srin gyi dbye bas so //üîΩde bzhin du khkh+h'a: khkhl'a khkhw'a khkh+r'a khkh+y'a khkh+h'a zhes pa ni chu la'o //üîΩde bzhin du ggh'a: ggl'a ggw'a gg+r'a gg+y'a ggh'a zhes pa ni me la'o //üîΩghghh'a: ghghl'a ghghw'a ghgh+r'a ghgh+y'a ghghh'a zhes pa ni rlung la'o //
analyzed: 'dir ya nara bsgyur ba rnams ni dbyangs zhes brjod de de dag dang lhan cig yi ge sum cu sum cu rnams mun pa'i yul gyi dus rgyu ste snga ma bzhin du lag pa dang rkang pa'i tshigs rnams kyi las kyi 'khor lo dang bya ba'i 'khor lo la yang sdud pa dang skyed pa'i dbye bas so // kk+h'a: kkl'a kkw'a kk+r'a kk+y'a kk+h'a zhes pa ni sa la chu srin gyi dbye bas so // de bzhin du khkh+h'a: khkhl'a khkhw'a khkh+r'a khkh+y'a khkh+h'a zhes pa ni chu la'o // de bzhin du ggh'a: ggl'a ggw'a gg+r'a gg+y'a ggh'a zhes pa ni me la'o // ghghh'a: ghghl'a ghghw'a ghgh+r'a ghgh+y'a ghghh'a zhes pa ni rlung la'o //
translated: As before, in the cakra of karma and the cakra of action in the joints of the hands and feet, there is the division of gathering and generation.

original: ddh'a: ddl'a ddw'a dd+r'a dd+y'a ddh'a zhes pa ni nam mkha' la ste de ltar g-yas pa la nyi ma rgyu'o //
analyzed: ddh'a: ddl'a ddw'a dd+r'a dd+y'a ddh'a zhes pa ni nam mkha' la ste de ltar g-yas pa la nyi ma rgyu'o //

original: da nas g-yon pa la skyed pa'i rim pas te /
analyzed: da nas g-yon pa la skyed pa'i rim pas te /
translated: Now, in the left nostril, the order is that of generation.

original: dha d+ya d+ra dwa dla dham zhes pa ni nam mkha' la'o //
analyzed: dha d+ya d+ra dwa dla dham zhes pa ni nam mkha' la'o //
translated: The vowels dha, dha, dha, dha, dha, dha, and dha are in space.

original: de bzhin du ghha gh+ya gh+ra ghwa ghla ghham zhes pa ni rlung la'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du ghha gh+ya gh+ra ghwa ghla ghham zhes pa ni rlung la'o //
translated: Similarly, gha, ghya, gra, gwra, gla, gha, and gha are in wind.

original: gha g+ya g+ra gwa gla gham zhes pa ni me la'o //
analyzed: gha g+ya g+ra gwa gla gham zhes pa ni me la'o //
translated: Gha, ghya, gra, gwra, gla, and gha are in fire.

original: kh+ha kh+ya kh+ra khwa khla kh+ham zhes pa ni chu la'o //
analyzed: kh+ha kh+ya kh+ra khwa khla kh+ham zhes pa ni chu la'o //
translated: Kkha, khya, kra, kwra, kla, kkha, and kkha are in water.

original: k+ha k+ya k+ra kwa kla k+ham zhes pa ni sa la ste de ltar dgun smad gyi dus su g-yon pa la skyed pa'i rim pas dbyangs sum cu po rnams nyi mas rgyu'o //
analyzed: k+ha k+ya k+ra kwa kla k+ham zhes pa ni sa la ste de ltar dgun smad gyi dus su g-yon pa la skyed pa'i rim pas dbyangs sum cu po rnams nyi mas rgyu'o //
translated: Kkha, khya, kra, kwra, kla, and kkha are in earth. Thus, in the winter season, the thirty vowels move through the sun in the left nostril in the order of generation.

original: de bzhin du dpyid la tsa sde'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du dpyid la tsa sde'o //
translated: Similarly, in spring, the ca group.

original: so ga la ta sde'o //
analyzed: so ga la ta sde'o //
translated: In summer, the ta group.

original: de nas tshigs drug la nyi ma ldog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas tshigs drug la nyi ma ldog par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, the sun reverses in the six joints.

original: rkang pa'i tshigs la zla ba rgyu ste sngar bzhin dbyar gyi dus su pa sde dang ston la ta sde dang dgun stod la sa sde rnams sdud pa'i dbye ba dang skyed pa'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: rkang pa'i tshigs la zla ba rgyu ste sngar bzhin dbyar gyi dus su pa sde dang ston la ta sde dang dgun stod la sa sde rnams sdud pa'i dbye ba dang skyed pa'i dbye bas so //
translated: The moon moves in the joints of the feet, as before. In the summer season, the pa group; in autumn, the ta group; and in the early winter, the sa group are included in the order of withdrawal and generation.

original: de ltar lo gsum pa la yang dbyangs sum brgya drug cu nyin mor byed pas rgyu'o //
analyzed: de ltar lo gsum pa la yang dbyangs sum brgya drug cu nyin mor byed pas rgyu'o //
translated: In that way, in the third year, the three hundred sixty vowels are the cause of the day maker.

original: de dag la dus kyi @261a * //
analyzed: de dag la dus kyi @261a * //
translated: The days

original: lo ni ji srid pa nyin zhag stong brgyad cu nying zad par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: lo ni ji srid pa nyin zhag stong brgyad cu nying zad par rig par bya'o //
translated: are to be understood as the exhaustion of one thousand eight hundred days.

original: lo gsum gyi rtsa dang yi ge gcod pa'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: lo gsum gyi rtsa dang yi ge gcod pa'i nges pa'o //
translated: This is the determination of the cutting of the channels and syllables of the three years.

original: de nas lo ni chad par 'gyur na phyogs kyi nang du dbyangs thung ngu dang ring po dang shin tu ring po bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i chos kyi dbyings kyi nyin zhag dbang gis te nyin zhag bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i dbang gis nyi ma'i dbye bas nyi ma dang
analyzed: de nas lo ni chad par 'gyur na phyogs kyi nang du dbyangs thung ngu dang ring po dang shin tu ring po bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i chos kyi dbyings kyi nyin zhag dbang gis te nyin zhag bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i dbang gis nyi ma'i dbye bas nyi ma dang
translated: Then, when the years are cut, by the power of the days of the dharmadhƒÅtu, there are forty-five short, long, and very long vowels in the directions.üîΩBy the division of the days, the days are caused to die. By the division of the months, the months die.

original: zla ba'i dbye bas zla ba'i 'chi ba rgyu ste mgrin pa la sngar nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang dpral ba la nyin zhag bcu bzhi sngar brjod pa rnams dang gsang bar bcu pa gsum zhes pa ni nyin zhag sum cu'o /
analyzed: zla ba'i dbye bas zla ba'i 'chi ba rgyu ste mgrin pa la sngar nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang dpral ba la nyin zhag bcu bzhi sngar brjod pa rnams dang gsang bar bcu pa gsum zhes pa ni nyin zhag sum cu'o /
translated: The thirty days of the throat, the twenty-eight days previously, the fourteen days of the forehead previously mentioned, and the ten days of the secret place are thirty days.

original: de nas mgrin pa la nyin zhag bzhi dang dpral ba la nyin zhag gnyis dang 'tsho ba'i mtshan mo gsum mo //
analyzed: de nas mgrin pa la nyin zhag bzhi dang dpral ba la nyin zhag gnyis dang 'tsho ba'i mtshan mo gsum mo //
translated: Then, four days in the throat, two days in the forehead, and three nights of life remain.

original: 'dir dbyangs gcod pa la tshes gzhan chu tshod lnga bcu rtsa drug gi bdag nyid gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir dbyangs gcod pa la tshes gzhan chu tshod lnga bcu rtsa drug gi bdag nyid gzung bar bya'o //
translated: Here, in the recitation of the vowels, the other days should be taken as having fifty-six hours.

original: de ltar tshes bzhi bcu rtsa lnga ni dbyangs kyi chos can te gsum ni stong pa'i chos can no //
analyzed: de ltar tshes bzhi bcu rtsa lnga ni dbyangs kyi chos can te gsum ni stong pa'i chos can no //
translated: Thus, forty-five days are the vowels, and three are the empty days.

original: gsal byed kyi chos la yang de bzhin du nyin zhag gnyis so //
analyzed: gsal byed kyi chos la yang de bzhin du nyin zhag gnyis so //
translated: In the consonants, two days are also like that.

original: 'di dag las nyin zhag brgyad ni snying kha'i padma la rgyu ste de nas rlung bcu po rnams yang dag par 'dus te lte ba la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su dbugs ni 'byung ba dang 'jug pa'i 'khor lo nyams pa'i bar du 'tsho ba dag ni mtshan
analyzed: 'di dag las nyin zhag brgyad ni snying kha'i padma la rgyu ste de nas rlung bcu po rnams yang dag par 'dus te lte ba la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su dbugs ni 'byung ba dang 'jug pa'i 'khor lo nyams pa'i bar du 'tsho ba dag ni mtshan

translated: Here, the exhaustion of the channels that descend to the outer ma·πá·∏çala of the navel chakra is completely discarded. When the three directions and the gutturals are formed on top of three years, for six days, the channels of the twelve houses, the ma·πá·∏çala of emptiness,

translated: In that way, [the vƒÅyus] move for six days. Then, after six days, having exhausted the nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s of the sense organs and objects, finally, on the day of death, the subtle avadh≈´ti moves.

translated: Having abandoned the moon and sun, the flow of feces and urine, the wind of great darkness, the time of death, flows until the end of the wheel of breath.üîΩThis is the certainty.üîΩThe day and night, the lotus of the heart, is the correct emission.

translated: Thus, the BhagavƒÅn has taught the certainty of timely death, the cessation of the channels of the movement of the sun and moon, the channels of action and activity, and the wheel of karma.

translated: The winds of the five ma·πá·∏çalas move in the channels in the body, and the winds of death enter the seventy-two thousand channels.

analyzed: dkyil 'khor lnga'i rlung gis drug cu'i cha shas der bkod nas rim pa las rgyu bar byed do //
translated: The winds of the five ma·πá·∏çalas move in the body in the parts of the sixty.

analyzed: dus kyi rtsa dang rlung gang rgyu zhe na /

analyzed: nyin mtshan dus la nyi ma zla bas rang rang rgyu ba dag @262a * // gis gang gang rdzogs par mi nus pa ste /
translated: The sun and moon move in the channels of the day and night.üîΩThe sun and moon are unable to complete their movements.

analyzed: nyi ma'i nyin zhag ces pa nyin zhag bcu gnyis ni nyi ma'i rgyu ba la yang bu lon du 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de phyed nyin zhag drug ni zla ba'i rgyu ba la'o /

translated: Here, in each month, the sun does not move through a sign in thirty days, and the moon does not move through sixty fingerbreadths in a month.

analyzed: de'i phyir rgyu skar nyin zhag rab tu dbye bas 'chi ba'i nyi zla rgyu ba stong pa'i zla ba dag la ste /
translated: Therefore, the movement of the sun and moon of death is in the empty months, divided by the lunar days.

translated: Where they have no power, that is the empty month at the end of thirty-two months, which is also the nature of sixty-four fingerbreadths.üîΩIn those sixty-four fingerbreadths, the empty vƒÅyu moves.

translated: From among the seventy-two thousand nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s in the navel cakra, two nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s move on each lunar day.

translated: Here, from among the twenty-one thousand [breaths] that are in excess of six hundred, that which falls into the ma·πá·∏çala of gnosis is called the ‚Äúexcessive breath‚Äù in the body.üîΩAt the junction of the clear light, in the middle of the two junctures, there are sixty [breaths] less than a vedha, that is, fifty-six [breaths] together with the vedha.

translated: Again and again, in the middle of the year, in this way, each day, a pair of channels is destroyed. In the course of a year, in the course of the three hundred and sixty days of the year, the sun and moon move through the right and left mandalas,

translated: Thus, the time is calculated by 76,000 days of 100 years, and the movement of the sun and moon is in the 72,000 channels that cause the five mandalas to fall in the middle of the life of gods and humans.

translated: The measure of each is the subtle body, the channels, the elements, the gods, and so on, by the days.

translated: Here, when the channel of time in the body, the central channel, is in a state of descent, if one consumes, becomes ill, or is sometimes struck by humans, at that time, by that basis, the root cakra

original: 'dir nyi shu lhag pa'i brgya'i cha brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir nyi shu lhag pa'i brgya'i cha brjod par bya ste /
translated: Here, the remainder of one hundred and twenty should be stated.

original: 'dir bcu bzhi'i cha'i lhag ma rkang pa gcig mthong na nyin zhag gi cha de'i chu tshod drug cu'i cha shas rnams kyi nang nas chu tshod lnga'i cha shas ni cha'i nor la lhag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dir bcu bzhi'i cha'i lhag ma rkang pa gcig mthong na nyin zhag gi cha de'i chu tshod drug cu'i cha shas rnams kyi nang nas chu tshod lnga'i cha shas ni cha'i nor la lhag par 'gyur ro //
translated: Here, if one part of the remainder of the fourteen parts is seen, then from among the sixty parts of the day, five parts of the hour are in excess of the error of the parts.

original: nag po 'am dkar po'i bu lon gyi gnas su dman par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nag po 'am dkar po'i bu lon gyi gnas su dman par 'gyur ro //
translated: It becomes inferior as a place of black or white debt.

original: nyin zhag gnyis pa la gnyis pa'i cha shas lnga ste /
analyzed: nyin zhag gnyis pa la gnyis pa'i cha shas lnga ste /
translated: On the second day, there are five parts of the second.

original: @263a * // dang po'i gzhon nu nyid kyis nyis 'gyur du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: @263a * // dang po'i gzhon nu nyid kyis nyis 'gyur du shes par bya'o //
translated: The first part is to be understood as the second part.

original: de bzhin du zhag gsum pa la gsum pa'i cha shas lnga'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du zhag gsum pa la gsum pa'i cha shas lnga'o //
translated: In the same way, on the third day, there are five parts of the third part,

original: gnyis pa'i bcu'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa'i bcu'o //
translated: ten of the second part,

original: dang po'i lang tsho'i dbye bas bcva lnga'o //
analyzed: dang po'i lang tsho'i dbye bas bcva lnga'o //
translated: and fifteen of the first part.

original: de bzhin du byis pa'i rab tu dbye bas bzhi pa'i chas shas lnga'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du byis pa'i rab tu dbye bas bzhi pa'i chas shas lnga'o //
translated: In the same way, on the fourth day, there are five parts of the fourth part,

original: gsum pa'i bcu'o //
analyzed: gsum pa'i bcu'o //
translated: ten of the third part,

original: gnyis pa'i bcva lnga'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa'i bcva lnga'o //
translated: fifteen of the second part,

original: dang po'i lang tsho'i dbye bas bcu dgu'o //
analyzed: dang po'i lang tsho'i dbye bas bcu dgu'o //
translated: and nineteen of the first part.

original: de bzhin du nyin zhag lnga pa la lnga pa'i cha shas lnga'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du nyin zhag lnga pa la lnga pa'i cha shas lnga'o //
translated: In the same way, on the fifth day, there are five parts of the fifth part,

original: bzhi pa'i bcu'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa'i bcu'o //
translated: ten of the fourth part,

original: gsum pa'i bcva lnga'o //
analyzed: gsum pa'i bcva lnga'o //
translated: fifteen of the third part,

original: gnyis pa'i bcu dgu'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa'i bcu dgu'o //
translated: nineteen of the second part,

original: dang po'i rgan po'i dbye bas nyi shu rtsa gnyis so //
analyzed: dang po'i rgan po'i dbye bas nyi shu rtsa gnyis so //
translated: and twenty-two of the first part.

original: de bzhin du nyin zhag drug pa la drug pa'i cha shas lnga'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du nyin zhag drug pa la drug pa'i cha shas lnga'o //
translated: In the same way, on the sixth day, there are five parts of the sixth part,

original: lnga pa'i bcu'o //
analyzed: lnga pa'i bcu'o //
translated: ten of the fifth part,

original: bzhi pa'i bcva lnga'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa'i bcva lnga'o //
translated: fifteen of the fourth part,

original: gsum pa'i bcu dgu'o //
analyzed: gsum pa'i bcu dgu'o //
translated: nineteen of the third part,

original: gnyis pa'i nyi shu rtsa gnyis so //
analyzed: gnyis pa'i nyi shu rtsa gnyis so //
translated: and twenty-two of the second part.

original: dang po'i shin tu rgan po'i dbye bas nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
analyzed: dang po'i shin tu rgan po'i dbye bas nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
translated: The first is divided into four parts, each of which is further divided into five parts, making twenty parts.

original: de ltar nyin zhag bdun pa la bdun pa'i cha shas lnga'o //
analyzed: de ltar nyin zhag bdun pa la bdun pa'i cha shas lnga'o //
translated: Thus, in the seven-day period, there are five parts of the seventh,

original: drug pa'i bcu'o //
analyzed: drug pa'i bcu'o //
translated: ten of the sixth,

original: lnga pa'i bcva lnga'o //
analyzed: lnga pa'i bcva lnga'o //
translated: fifteen of the fifth,

original: bzhi pa'i bcu dgu'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa'i bcu dgu'o //
translated: nineteen of the fourth,

original: gsum pa'i nyi shu rtsa gnyis so //
analyzed: gsum pa'i nyi shu rtsa gnyis so //
translated: twenty-two of the third,

original: gnyis pa'i nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa'i nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
translated: twenty-four of the second,üîΩand twenty-five of the first.

original: dang po'i smin pa'i gnas skabs kyi dbye bas nyin zhag bdun pa la cha shas nyi shu rtsa lnga rkang pa'i dbang pos nor ram bu lon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dang po'i smin pa'i gnas skabs kyi dbye bas nyin zhag bdun pa la cha shas nyi shu rtsa lnga rkang pa'i dbang pos nor ram bu lon du 'gyur ro //
translated: In the first stage of development, the twenty-five parts of the first day are the basis for the gain or loss of wealth.

original: de ltar byis pa la sogs pa'i rim pas thams cad kyi tshad shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar byis pa la sogs pa'i rim pas thams cad kyi tshad shes par bya'o //
translated: In this way, the measure of all [the parts] should be understood in sequence, beginning with the child.

original: de ltar tshes bdun rnams kyis rkang pa'i cha shas bzung nas snying kha'i padma la sogs pa rnams kyi 'dab ma nyi shu lhag pa'i brgya po rnams la ri bong mtshan ma rgyu zhing de nas slar yang ldog go //
analyzed: de ltar tshes bdun rnams kyis rkang pa'i cha shas bzung nas snying kha'i padma la sogs pa rnams kyi 'dab ma nyi shu lhag pa'i brgya po rnams la ri bong mtshan ma rgyu zhing de nas slar yang ldog go //
translated: In this way, having taken the parts of the foot with the seven days, the moon moves through the petals of the lotus of the heart, which are more than one hundred, and then returns again.

original: ri bong can gyi rkang pa ni rang gi rkang pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: ri bong can gyi rkang pa ni rang gi rkang pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The foot of the moon is the meaning of one's own foot.

original: snying khar 'dab ma brgyad la cha brgyad do //
analyzed: snying khar 'dab ma brgyad la cha brgyad do //
translated: In the heart, on eight petals, there are eight parts.

original: dpral bar 'dab ma bcu drug la cha bcu drug go //
analyzed: dpral bar 'dab ma bcu drug la cha bcu drug go //
translated: In the forehead, on sixteen petals, there are sixteen parts.

original: longs spyod du 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis la cha sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
analyzed: longs spyod du 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis la cha sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
translated: In the throat, on thirty-two petals, there are thirty-two parts.

original: lte ba'i padmar 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi la cha drug cu rtsa bzhi ste /
analyzed: lte ba'i padmar 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi la cha drug cu rtsa bzhi ste /
translated: In the navel lotus, on sixty-four petals, there are sixty-four parts.

original: de ltar cha shas nyi shu lhag pa'i brgya phrag gcig spyad nas zla ba'i cha 'grib pa'am 'phel ba ldog go //
analyzed: de ltar cha shas nyi shu lhag pa'i brgya phrag gcig spyad nas zla ba'i cha 'grib pa'am 'phel ba ldog go //
translated: Thus, having used one hundred and twenty parts, the waxing or waning of the lunar parts is reversed.

original: snying kha'i padma dang dpral bar 'byung ba phyogs dang nyin zhag ces bya ba rgyu ste /
analyzed: snying kha'i padma dang dpral bar 'byung ba phyogs dang nyin zhag ces bya ba rgyu ste /
translated: In the heart lotus and the forehead, the directions and the days are the cause.

original: longs spyod dang lte bar yang dgu ldan bcu dang drag po zung dang rgyal ba zhes bya ba dang de nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: longs spyod dang lte bar yang dgu ldan bcu dang drag po zung dang rgyal ba zhes bya ba dang de nyid ces bya'o //
translated: In the throat and the navel, there are also nine, ten, the pair of Rudras, and the Victor, and reality.

original: zhag @263b bdun dag nas slar yang ri bong mtshan ma gang 'di rim pa min pas 'dor dang po'i cha'i cha shas nyi shu rtsa lnga yongs su smin par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nyin zhag brgyad pa la lte bar lhag pa'i lhar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhag @263b bdun dag nas slar yang ri bong mtshan ma gang 'di rim pa min pas 'dor dang po'i cha'i cha shas nyi shu rtsa lnga yongs su smin par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nyin zhag brgyad pa la lte bar lhag pa'i lhar 'gyur ro //
translated: After seven days, again, the sign of the rabbit, which is not in order, is the twenty-fifth part of the first part, which is fully formed, which becomes the remaining god at the navel on the eighth day.

original: slar yang zla ba nya ba la lte ba dang snying kha dang mgrin pa dang dpral ba rnams la rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: slar yang zla ba nya ba la lte ba dang snying kha dang mgrin pa dang dpral ba rnams la rdzogs par byed do //
translated: Again, on the full moon, it is completed at the navel, heart, throat, and forehead.

original: thig le'i gnas su thig le dag la rdzogs par byas nas zhes pa ni lte ba de nas slar yang rim pa min pas 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi po rnams la cha drug cu rtsa bzhi'o //
analyzed: thig le'i gnas su thig le dag la rdzogs par byas nas zhes pa ni lte ba de nas slar yang rim pa min pas 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi po rnams la cha drug cu rtsa bzhi'o //
translated: Having completed the drops in the places of the drops, that is, from the navel, again, in the reverse order, there are thirty-four parts on the sixty-four petals.

original: snying khar cha brgyad do //
analyzed: snying khar cha brgyad do //
translated: At the heart, there are eight parts.

original: mgrin par cha sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
analyzed: mgrin par cha sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
translated: At the throat, there are thirty-two parts.

original: dpral bar cha bcu drug go //
analyzed: dpral bar cha bcu drug go //
translated: At the forehead, there are sixteen parts.

original: de ltar nyin zhag bcu bzhis rkang pa rnams rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar nyin zhag bcu bzhis rkang pa rnams rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: In that way, the limbs are completed in fourteen days.

original: de la rdzogs par byas nas snying khar rab 'jug dkar po'i phyogs la ste nor gyi phyogs la rim pas so //
analyzed: de la rdzogs par byas nas snying khar rab 'jug dkar po'i phyogs la ste nor gyi phyogs la rim pas so //
translated: Having completed that, he should enter the heart on the bright side, that is, on the side of wealth, in order.

original: slar yang nag po dag la de bzhin te bu lon gyi phyogs la rim pa snga ma bzhin du rim pa min pas rlung dang / sa dang / chu dang / me'i padma'i 'dab ma rnams la sdud pa ste /
analyzed: slar yang nag po dag la de bzhin te bu lon gyi phyogs la rim pa snga ma bzhin du rim pa min pas rlung dang / sa dang / chu dang / me'i padma'i 'dab ma rnams la sdud pa ste /
translated: Again, on the dark side, it is the same way. On the side of debt, the order is not the same as before. The winds, earth, water, and fire petals are contracted.

original: snying khar nag po'i rkang pa rnams kyi bu lon rdzogs par gyur gyi bar du'o zhes pa ni rkang pa'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: snying khar nag po'i rkang pa rnams kyi bu lon rdzogs par gyur gyi bar du'o zhes pa ni rkang pa'i nges pa'o //
translated: In the heart, the dark feet are completed in the debt. This is the rule of the feet.

original: 'dir padma rnams ni snying khar rtsibs brgyad pa nag po'o //
analyzed: 'dir padma rnams ni snying khar rtsibs brgyad pa nag po'o //
translated: Here, the lotuses are black with eight petals in the heart.

original: spyi bor rtsibs bcu drug pa dkar po'o ;
analyzed: spyi bor rtsibs bcu drug pa dkar po'o ;
translated: At the crown, it is a white one with sixteen petals.

original: / mgrin par rtsibs sum cu rtsa gnyis pa dmar po'o //
analyzed: / mgrin par rtsibs sum cu rtsa gnyis pa dmar po'o //
translated: At the throat, it is a red one with thirty-two petals.

original: gzhan ni de'i nyis 'gyur te lte ba la rtsibs drug cu rtsa bzhi pa ser po'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni de'i nyis 'gyur te lte ba la rtsibs drug cu rtsa bzhi pa ser po'o //
translated: The others are twice that. At the navel, it is a yellow one with sixty-four petals.

original: padma'i 'dab ma'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: padma'i 'dab ma'i nges pa'o //
translated: This is the rule of the lotus petals.

original: da ni brgyad pa gnyis zhes pa la sogs pas tshigs bzhi'i gnas gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni brgyad pa gnyis zhes pa la sogs pas tshigs bzhi'i gnas gsungs te /
translated: Now, the eighth, etc., explains the four lines of the location.

original: 'dir snying kha'i padma la sogs pa rlung dang / me dang / chu dang / sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin rnams kyi lte ba'i ge sar gyi rtse mo rnams la dbyangs kyi dbye bas zla ba rgyu'o //
analyzed: 'dir snying kha'i padma la sogs pa rlung dang / me dang / chu dang / sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin rnams kyi lte ba'i ge sar gyi rtse mo rnams la dbyangs kyi dbye bas zla ba rgyu'o //
translated: Here, the moon moves on the tips of the stamens of the lotus of the heart, etc., by the division of the vowels of the natures of the elements of wind, fire, water, and earth.

original: aa sogs sum cu'i dbyangs gang ha ya ra wa lar ldan thig le dpal ldan rnam par bcad pa yis //üîΩphye ba drug cur 'gyur te zhes pa ni 'dir sngar brjod pa'i thung ngu lnga dang yon tan gyi ngo bo lnga dang ya na ra bsgyur ba thung du lnga ste bcva lnga po 'di dag thig les phye ba ni sum cur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: aa sogs sum cu'i dbyangs gang ha ya ra wa lar ldan thig le dpal ldan rnam par bcad pa yis // phye ba drug cur 'gyur te zhes pa ni 'dir sngar brjod pa'i thung ngu lnga dang yon tan gyi ngo bo lnga dang ya na ra bsgyur ba thung du lnga ste bcva lnga po 'di dag thig les phye ba ni sum cur 'gyur ro //
translated: The vowels of the thirty, beginning with a, endowed with ya, ra, la, and va, by the glory of the bindu, are divided by the thirty.üîΩHere, the fifteen, the five short ones mentioned before, the five of the nature of the qualities, and the five short ones transformed by ya and ra, are divided by the bindu, becoming thirty.

original: ring po dang 'phel bar gnas pa dang h'a la sogs pa bcva lnga rnam par bcad pas phye ba ni sum cu ste de ltar na drug cur 'gyur @264a * //
analyzed: ring po dang 'phel bar gnas pa dang h'a la sogs pa bcva lnga rnam par bcad pas phye ba ni sum cu ste de ltar na drug cur 'gyur @264a * //
translated: The long ones, the five of the nature of the qualities, and the fifteen, the five of the nature of the qualities, and the five short ones transformed by ya and ra, are divided by the thirty, becoming thirty. Thus, there are sixty.

original: ro ; / de dag dus dang mi bdag nor dang so rnams ge sar rtse mo la'o zhes pa ni 'dir zla bas snying kha'i padma la gnam stong du byas nas phyed snga ma dang phyed phyi ma'i cha'i dbye bas tshes bco lnga nas dbyangs sum cu po rnams rgyu'o
analyzed: ro ; / de dag dus dang mi bdag nor dang so rnams ge sar rtse mo la'o zhes pa ni 'dir zla bas snying kha'i padma la gnam stong du byas nas phyed snga ma dang phyed phyi ma'i cha'i dbye bas tshes bco lnga nas dbyangs sum cu po rnams rgyu'o
translated: Here, the moon, having made the full moon the fifteenth day of the month, moves the thirty vowels from the fifteenth day of the bright fortnight to the fifteenth day of the dark fortnight, dividing each day into an earlier and a later half.

original: // 'dir snying kha'i padma'i ge sar gyi rtse mo dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig gi phyed snga ma la aa /
analyzed: // 'dir snying kha'i padma'i ge sar gyi rtse mo dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig gi phyed snga ma la aa /
translated: Here, on the white side of the tips of the filaments of the lotus of the heart, on the first day of the month, the earlier half is a,

analyzed: phyed phyi ma la aam /
translated: and the later half is ƒÅ.

original: gnyis pa'i phyed la snga ma la ai /
analyzed: gnyis pa'i phyed la snga ma la ai /
translated: On the second day, the earlier half is i,üîΩand the later half is ƒ´.

original: phyed phyi ma la aim zhes pa ste lte ba spangs nas snying khar dus zhes pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: phyed phyi ma la aim zhes pa ste lte ba spangs nas snying khar dus zhes pa bzhi'o //
translated: Thus, abandoning the navel, the four times are in the heart.

original: de nas mgrin pa'i padma'i ge sar gyi rtse mor gsum pa'i phyed snga ma dang phyi ma la ri ri /
analyzed: de nas mgrin pa'i padma'i ge sar gyi rtse mor gsum pa'i phyed snga ma dang phyi ma la ri ri /
translated: Then, on the tips of the filaments of the lotus of the throat, on the earlier and later halves of the third day, are ri and ri.

original: de bzhin du bzhi pa la au aum /
analyzed: de bzhin du bzhi pa la au aum /
translated: Similarly, on the fourth day, are u and ≈´.

original: de bzhin du lnga pa la li lim /
analyzed: de bzhin du lnga pa la li lim /
translated: Similarly, on the fifth day, are li and li.

original: drug pa la aa aam /
analyzed: drug pa la aa aam /
translated: On the sixth day, are e and ai.

original: bdun pa la ae aem /
analyzed: bdun pa la ae aem /
translated: On the seventh day, are o and au.

original: brgyad pa la ge sar gyi rtse mor phyed snga ma la aa ra /
analyzed: brgyad pa la ge sar gyi rtse mor phyed snga ma la aa ra /
translated: On the eighth, on the tip of the stamen, one should practice the first half of ƒÅra and the second half of ra·πÉ in the center.

original: phyed phyi ma la lte bar aa ram zhes pa dang / dgu pa la ao aom /
analyzed: phyed phyi ma la lte bar aa ram zhes pa dang / dgu pa la ao aom /
translated: On the ninth, one should practice o·πÉ and au·πÉ.

original: bcu pa la aa la aa lam zhes pa ni mgrin pa'i padma'i ge sar gyi rtse mo la spyod do //
analyzed: bcu pa la aa la aa lam zhes pa ni mgrin pa'i padma'i ge sar gyi rtse mo la spyod do //
translated: On the tenth, one should practice ƒÅ la ƒÅ la in the center of the stamen of the throat lotus.

original: de nas dpral ba'i padma'i ge sar gyi rtse mor bcu gcig pa'i phyed snga ma dang phyi ma la ha ham /
analyzed: de nas dpral ba'i padma'i ge sar gyi rtse mor bcu gcig pa'i phyed snga ma dang phyi ma la ha ham /
translated: Then, on the tip of the stamen of the forehead lotus, one should practice the first and second half of the eleventh [ƒÅ·∏• and ha·πÉ].

original: bcu gnyis pa'i phyed snga ma dang phyi ma la ya yam /
analyzed: bcu gnyis pa'i phyed snga ma dang phyi ma la ya yam /
translated: On the first and second half of the twelfth [ya and ya],

original: bcu gsum pa la ra ram /
analyzed: bcu gsum pa la ra ram /
translated: on the thirteenth [ra and ra],

original: bcu bzhi pa la wa wam /
analyzed: bcu bzhi pa la wa wam /
translated: on the fourteenth [va and va],

original: nya'i phyed snga ma la ge sar gyi rtse mor la zhes dang / phyed phyi ma la lte bar lam zhes pa ste /
analyzed: nya'i phyed snga ma la ge sar gyi rtse mor la zhes dang / phyed phyi ma la lte bar lam zhes pa ste /
translated: and on the first half of the fifteenth [la and la] on the tip of the stamen, and on the second half [la and la] in the center,

original: spyi bor zla ba rdzogs pa'i skyed pa'i rim pas rlung dang / me dang / chu'i padma'i lte ba rnams la spyod do //
analyzed: spyi bor zla ba rdzogs pa'i skyed pa'i rim pas rlung dang / me dang / chu'i padma'i lte ba rnams la spyod do //
translated: one should practice the generation stage of the complete moon at the crown, the wind, the fire, and the water lotuses.

original: de nas sa'i padma'i lte ba rnams su nag po'i phyogs la sdud pa'i rim pas ring po rnam par bcad pa rnams spyod do //
analyzed: de nas sa'i padma'i lte ba rnams su nag po'i phyogs la sdud pa'i rim pas ring po rnam par bcad pa rnams spyod do //
translated: Then, in the centers of the lotuses of the earth, one should practice the long vowels, in the order of the waning phase.

original: 'di lta ste nag po'i tshes gcig gi phyed snga ma la l'a: phyed phyi ma la l'a /
analyzed: 'di lta ste nag po'i tshes gcig gi phyed snga ma la l'a: phyed phyi ma la l'a /
translated: Thus, in the first half of the first day of the dark phase, la; in the second half, la.

original: de bzhin du gnyis pa la w'a: w'a /
analyzed: de bzhin du gnyis pa la w'a: w'a /
translated: Likewise, in the second, va; va.

original: gsum pa la r'a: r'a /
analyzed: gsum pa la r'a: r'a /
translated: In the third, ra; ra.

original: bzhi pa la y'a: y'a /
analyzed: bzhi pa la y'a: y'a /
translated: In the fourth, ya; ya.

original: lnga pa la h'a: h'a /
analyzed: lnga pa la h'a: h'a /
translated: In the fifth, ha; ha.

original: drug pa la a'a la: a'a la /
analyzed: drug pa la a'a la: a'a la /
translated: In the sixth, a; a.

original: bdun pa la aoo: aoo /
analyzed: bdun pa la aoo: aoo /
translated: In the seventh, o; o.

original: brgyad pa la lte bar a'a ra: a'a ra /
analyzed: brgyad pa la lte bar a'a ra: a'a ra /
translated: In the eighth, in the center, a; a.

original: dgu pa la aee: aee /
analyzed: dgu pa la aee: aee /
translated: In the ninth, e; e.

original: bcu pa la a'a: a'a /
analyzed: bcu pa la a'a: a'a /
translated: In the tenth, a; a.

original: bcu gcig pa la l'i: l'i /
analyzed: bcu gcig pa la l'i: l'i /
translated: In the eleventh, li; li.

original: bcu gnyis pa la a'u: a'u /
analyzed: bcu gnyis pa la a'u: a'u /
translated: In the twelfth, u; u.

original: bcu gsum pa la r'i: r'i /

original: chu srang de drug cus chu tshod gcig tu 'gyur te dbyug gu gcig gi bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: chu srang de drug cus chu tshod gcig tu 'gyur te dbyug gu gcig gi bdag nyid can no //
translated: Sixty of those finger-breadths are one water-measure, which is one staff.

original: chu tshod de dag drug cu ni nyin zhag ste nyin mtshan du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chu tshod de dag drug cu ni nyin zhag ste nyin mtshan du 'gyur ro //
translated: Sixty of those water-measures are one day and night.

original: gsum gyis bsgyur ba bcu ste sum cu'i nyin zhag de dag gis zla ba gcig go //
analyzed: gsum gyis bsgyur ba bcu ste sum cu'i nyin zhag de dag gis zla ba gcig go //
translated: Thirty of those days and nights are one month.

original: chu srin la sogs pa'i zla ba de dag drug gis bgrod pa gcig tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chu srin la sogs pa'i zla ba de dag drug gis bgrod pa gcig tu 'gyur ro //
translated: Those months of Makara and so forth are six, and that is one transit.

original: bgrod pa de nyid gnyis kyis bsgyur ba ni lo gcig tu rab tu grags so //
analyzed: bgrod pa de nyid gnyis kyis bsgyur ba ni lo gcig tu rab tu grags so //
translated: That transit itself, doubled, is well known as one year.

original: skyes bu rnams kyi tshe lo brgya po 'di las bu lon bgrod par son pa ni mun pa'i rtsa'i bgrod par son pa'o //
analyzed: skyes bu rnams kyi tshe lo brgya po 'di las bu lon bgrod par son pa ni mun pa'i rtsa'i bgrod par son pa'o //
translated: In this one hundred years of human beings, the transit of debt is the transit of the channel of darkness.

original: dus ni 'chi ba ste de'i rtsa yi dbang gis ni aa ba dh'u t'i'i grangs kyi chos kyis so zhes pa ste dus kyi rtsa'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: dus ni 'chi ba ste de'i rtsa yi dbang gis ni aa ba dh'u t'i'i grangs kyi chos kyis so zhes pa ste dus kyi rtsa'i nges pa'o //
translated: Time is death, and by the power of that channel, by the dharma of the number of the avadh≈´tƒ´, is the determination of the channel of time.

original: da ni 'jig rten gsum na zhes pa la sogs pas dbang phyug la sogs pa rnams dman pa nyid du gsungs te /üîΩ'dir 'jig rten gsum na lha dang lag 'gro mi rnams kyi nang na gang zhig rang gi lus la zla ba nyi ma dag rdzogs par nus pa'i @266a * //
analyzed: da ni 'jig rten gsum na zhes pa la sogs pas dbang phyug la sogs pa rnams dman pa nyid du gsungs te / 'dir 'jig rten gsum na lha dang lag 'gro mi rnams kyi nang na gang zhig rang gi lus la zla ba nyi ma dag rdzogs par nus pa'i @266a * //
translated: Now, beginning with ‚ÄúIn the three worlds,‚Äù etc., it is said that ƒ™≈õvara and so forth are inferior.

original: rnal 'byor ldan pa med do //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ldan pa med do //
translated: Here, in the three worlds of gods, beasts, and humans, there is no one endowed with yoga who is able to perfect the sun and moon in his own body.

original: de rgyu gang las zhe na gang gi phyir zla bas rang gi rgyu bas lo'i mtshams su nyin zhag gi tshogs sum brgya drug cu rgyu ba ma yin zhing /
analyzed: de rgyu gang las zhe na gang gi phyir zla bas rang gi rgyu bas lo'i mtshams su nyin zhag gi tshogs sum brgya drug cu rgyu ba ma yin zhing /
translated: What is the cause of that? Because the moon does not move in a year‚Äôs time the collection of days and nights of three hundred and sixty,

original: srid par te lus la lo yi nang du rim pas te sngar brjod pa'i cho ga dag gis nyi mas kyang ni rgyu skar thams cad de nyi shu rtsa bdun rgyu ba min pa de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: srid par te lus la lo yi nang du rim pas te sngar brjod pa'i cho ga dag gis nyi mas kyang ni rgyu skar thams cad de nyi shu rtsa bdun rgyu ba min pa de'i phyir ro //
translated: and the sun also does not move all the lunar mansions, twenty-seven, in a year‚Äôs time in the body, in existence, by the process previously described.

original: lo so so nas lo so sor bu lon dag gis de ni srid pa ste lus za'o //
analyzed: lo so so nas lo so sor bu lon dag gis de ni srid pa ste lus za'o //
translated: In each year, in each year, existence, the body, is eaten by the debts.

original: dus kyi 'khor lo dpa' bo gcig pu skye ba dang 'jig pa'i rgyur gyur pa ste 'khor ba pa rnams la dus kyi 'khor lo dpa' bo gcig bu'o //
analyzed: dus kyi 'khor lo dpa' bo gcig pu skye ba dang 'jig pa'i rgyur gyur pa ste 'khor ba pa rnams la dus kyi 'khor lo dpa' bo gcig bu'o //
translated: The KƒÅlacakra, the sole hero, is the cause of birth and destruction, for the transmigrators, the KƒÅlacakra, the sole hero.

original: de'i phyir rnal 'byor las zla ba dang nyi ma dag rdzogs par byas te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rnal 'byor las zla ba dang nyi ma dag rdzogs par byas te /
translated: Therefore, the yogƒ´ should complete the moon and sun.

original: byang chub kyi sems dang / rdul gyi sems kyi chos srog dang thur sel dag rdzogs par byas nas de bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems dang / rdul gyi sems kyi chos srog dang thur sel dag rdzogs par byas nas de bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
translated: Having perfected the bodhicitta and the anus, one should accomplish that. This is the rule of the Blessed Buddha.

original: da ni 'chad pa zhes pa la sogs pas 'chi ltas kyi dbang gis gci ba la sogs pa'i khams kyi rnam par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni 'chad pa zhes pa la sogs pas 'chi ltas kyi dbang gis gci ba la sogs pa'i khams kyi rnam par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid gsungs te /
translated: Now, beginning with ‚ÄúThe explanation,‚Äù he states the characteristics of the transformation of the elements such as urine due to the signs of death.

original: 'dir lus la 'chad pa gal te g-yon pa'am g-yas pa'i rtsa gcig srog rab tu 'bab pa dang bral ba yin na mi yi bdag po zhes pa ni bod pa ste zla ba drug gi mtshams su gci ba dag ni skyur ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dir lus la 'chad pa gal te g-yon pa'am g-yas pa'i rtsa gcig srog rab tu 'bab pa dang bral ba yin na mi yi bdag po zhes pa ni bod pa ste zla ba drug gi mtshams su gci ba dag ni skyur ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Here, if one of the left or right channels is devoid of the flow of life, then, the lord of men, having been warned, in six months urine will become sour.

original: de tsam rnams ni nyin zhag lnga nas mchog gi rtsa srog gi nus pa chen po yis 'dor te rim pa bzhin nyin zhag so sor gong bu 'chad pa'i dus su'o //
analyzed: de tsam rnams ni nyin zhag lnga nas mchog gi rtsa srog gi nus pa chen po yis 'dor te rim pa bzhin nyin zhag so sor gong bu 'chad pa'i dus su'o //
translated: In that amount of time, from five days, the supreme channel, with great life force, is abandoned, in order, on each day, at the time of the breaking of the aggregate.

original: nyin zhag drug gi mtshams su yul sgra rna ba la 'dor te rna ba la zhes pa ni lung gi tshig las lnga pa'i don la bdun pa'o //
analyzed: nyin zhag drug gi mtshams su yul sgra rna ba la 'dor te rna ba la zhes pa ni lung gi tshig las lnga pa'i don la bdun pa'o //
translated: At the end of six days, sound is lost to the ears.

original: nyin zhag lnga'i mtshams su ro yang nges par kha las te lce las 'dor ro //
analyzed: nyin zhag lnga'i mtshams su ro yang nges par kha las te lce las 'dor ro //
translated: At the end of five days, taste is lost from the tongue.

original: nyin zhag bzhi'i mtshams su mig 'bras mig gi dbus nas so //
analyzed: nyin zhag bzhi'i mtshams su mig 'bras mig gi dbus nas so //
translated: At the end of four days, the eyeballs sink into the middle of the eyes.

original: nyin zhag gsum gyi mtshams su dri ni sna las so //üîΩnyin zhag gnyis kyi mtshams su mi rnams dag gi lag pa rkang pa'i lus las dro ba'i dngos po ste reg pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: nyin zhag gsum gyi mtshams su dri ni sna las so // nyin zhag gnyis kyi mtshams su mi rnams dag gi lag pa rkang pa'i lus las dro ba'i dngos po ste reg pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: At the end of three days, smell is lost from the nose.üîΩAt the end of two days, warmth is lost from the hands and feet.

original: mtha'i nyin zhag la chos kyi dbyings khu ba 'pho ba dang dbugs kyi 'khor lo yang 'dor ro //
analyzed: mtha'i nyin zhag la chos kyi dbyings khu ba 'pho ba dang dbugs kyi 'khor lo yang 'dor ro //
translated: On the last day, the element of space moves from the space of the heart, and the wheel of the breath is lost.

original: nyin zhag drug gi nang du 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid gzhan yang gsungs te /
analyzed: nyin zhag drug gi nang du 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid gzhan yang gsungs te /
translated: Other characteristics of death are also mentioned within the six days.

original: 'dir lus la 'chi bar rab tu zhugs par gyur na @266b rang gi lus sna yi rtse mo 'phyang ba glang po che'i sna'i rnam par mthong ba dang / rang gi spyi bor lag pa bzhag pa de yi rang bzhin dag tu mthong ste phra mor mthong ba min pa dang /
analyzed: 'dir lus la 'chi bar rab tu zhugs par gyur na @266b rang gi lus sna yi rtse mo 'phyang ba glang po che'i sna'i rnam par mthong ba dang / rang gi spyi bor lag pa bzhag pa de yi rang bzhin dag tu mthong ste phra mor mthong ba min pa dang /
translated: Here, when death has set in on the body, one sees one‚Äôs body hanging from the tip of one‚Äôs nose in the form of an elephant‚Äôs trunk, and one sees one‚Äôs hand placed on one‚Äôs head in that same way. One does not see these things as subtle.

original: de bzhin du lag pa gnyis ka'i mthil la rgya skyegs tshon gyis rab tu byugs kyang lag mthil gyi pags pa la dmar po nyid du byed pa ma yin pa dang nyi ma kha dog nag por mthong ba dang yongs su gyur pa'i ri bong 'dzin pa ste
analyzed: de bzhin du lag pa gnyis ka'i mthil la rgya skyegs tshon gyis rab tu byugs kyang lag mthil gyi pags pa la dmar po nyid du byed pa ma yin pa dang nyi ma kha dog nag por mthong ba dang yongs su gyur pa'i ri bong 'dzin pa ste
translated: Likewise, one sees the two palms of one‚Äôs hands smeared with red dye, but one does not see the skin of one‚Äôs palms as red. One sees the sun as black in color and the completely transformed rabbit-holder.

original: nya'i zla ba yongs su rdzogs par ser por mthong ba ni nyin zhag drug gi mtshams su'o //
analyzed: nya'i zla ba yongs su rdzogs par ser por mthong ba ni nyin zhag drug gi mtshams su'o //
translated: One sees the full moon of the fish as yellow at the juncture of six days.

original: de nas nyin zhag gang la gcin dang lus kyang bsil bar gyur pa'i nyin zhag de la 'chi ba nyid de mi yi bdag po zhes pa ni bod pa'o //
analyzed: de nas nyin zhag gang la gcin dang lus kyang bsil bar gyur pa'i nyin zhag de la 'chi ba nyid de mi yi bdag po zhes pa ni bod pa'o //
translated: Then, on the day when urine and the body become cool, on that day one dies. This is the Tibetan translation.

original: nyin zhag drug gi mtshams su 'chi ba'i mtshan ma gzhan yang gsungs te /
analyzed: nyin zhag drug gi mtshams su 'chi ba'i mtshan ma gzhan yang gsungs te /
translated: Other signs of death are also mentioned, occurring every six days.

original: 'dir dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bas non pa'i lce 'og tu nag po'i thig ste ri mo rnams nag por rab tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dir dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bas non pa'i lce 'og tu nag po'i thig ste ri mo rnams nag por rab tu 'gyur ro //
translated: Here, for one oppressed by untimely death, the lines or marks under the tongue become very black.

original: de bzhin du mig la tshangs pa'i ri mo shin tu phra mo skra'i tshad tsam gyi ri mo ste nag po dang dmar po'i dkyil 'khor 'byed par byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du mig la tshangs pa'i ri mo shin tu phra mo skra'i tshad tsam gyi ri mo ste nag po dang dmar po'i dkyil 'khor 'byed par byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Similarly, in the eyes, the very fine lines of Brahma, the size of a hair, separate the black and red circles.

original: dbugs ni zla ba nyi ma'i lam du 'phro bar mkhur  chos gnyis po bskyod pa dang / de bzhin du nu ma'i steng ni mchan khung du zhugs te nu ma'i steng gi rtsa dag mchan khung du zhugs par gyur pa dang / gza'i tshogs rnams mtha' dag mi mthong ste me stag dang bcas par mthong ba dang de'i mgrin pa lus dang bcas pa ste /
analyzed: dbugs ni zla ba nyi ma'i lam du 'phro bar mkhur  chos gnyis po bskyod pa dang / de bzhin du nu ma'i steng ni mchan khung du zhugs te nu ma'i steng gi rtsa dag mchan khung du zhugs par gyur pa dang / gza'i tshogs rnams mtha' dag mi mthong ste me stag dang bcas par mthong ba dang de'i mgrin pa lus dang bcas pa ste /
translated: The breath moves in the path of the sun and moon, the cheeks move, and likewise, the upper breast enters the armpit, and the channels of the upper breast enter the armpit. The entire host of planets is not seen, but is seen with sparks. The throat and body

original: lag pa dang rkang pa dang bcas pa rengs shing sems med pa dang 'khor ba yang ste 'di dag ni lus la 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur bar 'dod de gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: lag pa dang rkang pa dang bcas pa rengs shing sems med pa dang 'khor ba yang ste 'di dag ni lus la 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur bar 'dod de gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The body becomes stiff, with hands and feet rigid and lifeless, and the eyes roll back. These are held to be the characteristics of death for the body.

original: gzhan yang lus sam phyi rol la grib ma'i skyes bu la sogs pa gang cung zad phyin ci log tu mthong ba de thams cad 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid du rnal 'byor pas rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang lus sam phyi rol la grib ma'i skyes bu la sogs pa gang cung zad phyin ci log tu mthong ba de thams cad 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid du rnal 'byor pas rig par bya'o //
translated: Moreover, whatever is seen as distorted in the body or externally, such as a shadow person, the yogi should know all of that to be a characteristic of death.

original: de shes nas sbyin pa la sogs pa bya ste gal te bsod nams kyi stobs kyis 'tsho ba de lta na yang mdzes shing /
analyzed: de shes nas sbyin pa la sogs pa bya ste gal te bsod nams kyi stobs kyis 'tsho ba de lta na yang mdzes shing /
translated: Having understood that, one should practice generosity and so forth. If one lives through the power of merit, that is good.

original: ci ste 'chi bar 'gyur ba de lta na yang gang byin pa de'i 'bras bu rjes su spyod do //
analyzed: ci ste 'chi bar 'gyur ba de lta na yang gang byin pa de'i 'bras bu rjes su spyod do //
translated: But if one dies, then one will experience the results of whatever generosity one has practiced.

original: de'i phyir phyogs gnyis ka la yang bde bar gshegs pa pa bde ba don du gnyer ba rnams kyis sbyin par byin par bya'o zhes pa @267a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir phyogs gnyis ka la yang bde bar gshegs pa pa bde ba don du gnyer ba rnams kyis sbyin par byin par bya'o zhes pa @267a * //
translated: Therefore, for both cases, the Sugata has stated that those who seek happiness should practice generosity.

original: ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
analyzed: ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
translated: This is the definite statement of the Blessed One.

original: bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i 'grel bshad rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa stong phrag bcu gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i 'od las 'chi ltas kyi 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid dang rtsa 'chad pa'i mdor bsdus chen po ste bzhi pa'o /
analyzed: bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i 'grel bshad rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa stong phrag bcu gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i 'od las 'chi ltas kyi 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid dang rtsa 'chad pa'i mdor bsdus chen po ste bzhi pa'o /
translated: The fourth [chapter] is the great summary from the Stainless Light, a commentary on the root tantra, the King of Tantras, the Wheel of Time, which is a twelve thousand [verse] treatise that follows the root tantra, on the characteristics of death and the signs of death, and on the channels.

original: // / da ni skye ba dang ni zhes pa la sogs pas 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyis skyed pa dang sdud pa'i mtshan nyid byed pa po gsungs te /
analyzed: // / da ni skye ba dang ni zhes pa la sogs pas 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyis skyed pa dang sdud pa'i mtshan nyid byed pa po gsungs te /
translated: Now, beginning with ‚Äúbirth and so forth,‚Äù the author of the characteristics of creation and collection by the conventional reality of the world is stated.

original: 'khor ba 'dir 'pho ba'i skad cig gang yin pa des sems can rnams kyi skye ba byed de mngal du kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa rdul dang khu ba dang yang dag par ldan pa'i chos can no //
analyzed: 'khor ba 'dir 'pho ba'i skad cig gang yin pa des sems can rnams kyi skye ba byed de mngal du kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa rdul dang khu ba dang yang dag par ldan pa'i chos can no //
translated: The moment of transference in this cyclic existence creates the birth of sentient beings, the all-base consciousness in the womb, endowed with the qualities of semen and blood.

original: de nas des mngal nas btsa' ba'i dus byed cing byis pa dang gzhon nu la sogs pa'i gzugs byed de lus skyed pa'o //
analyzed: de nas des mngal nas btsa' ba'i dus byed cing byis pa dang gzhon nu la sogs pa'i gzugs byed de lus skyed pa'o //
translated: Then, it creates the time of birth from the womb, the forms of the child, youth, and so on, and creates the body.

original: 'pho ba'i skad cig de nyid 'jig rten dag tu ste mtho ris dang mi yul dang sa 'og tu slar yang sdud par byed pa dus kyi 'khor lo can te nyi ma min /
analyzed: 'pho ba'i skad cig de nyid 'jig rten dag tu ste mtho ris dang mi yul dang sa 'og tu slar yang sdud par byed pa dus kyi 'khor lo can te nyi ma min /
translated: The moment of the transference is again the gathering in the worlds, i.e., the heavens, the human realm, and the underworld, of the one who has the wheel of time, i.e., the sun.

original: nyi ma rdul dang zla ba khu ba dus kyi 'khor lo med pa ste /
analyzed: nyi ma rdul dang zla ba khu ba dus kyi 'khor lo med pa ste /
translated: The sun, which is the property of semen, and the moon, which is the property of ovum, are not the wheel of time.

original: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa med pas mi byed do zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa med pas mi byed do zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that they do not function because the consciousness of the ground of all does not exist.

original: 'dir rdul dang khu ba'i chos can nyi ma dang zla bas ci'i phyir mi byed ce na /
analyzed: 'dir rdul dang khu ba'i chos can nyi ma dang zla bas ci'i phyir mi byed ce na /
translated: Here, why do the sun and moon, which are the properties of semen and ovum, not function?

original: 'dir thams cad du me dang nyi ma dang zla ba'i bdag nyid ni 'gro ba'o zhes pa rab tu grags pa'i tshig gi phyir gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dir thams cad du me dang nyi ma dang zla ba'i bdag nyid ni 'gro ba'o zhes pa rab tu grags pa'i tshig gi phyir gsungs so //
translated: Here it is said because of the well-known statement, Everywhere, the self of fire, sun, and moon is the world.

original: 'dir gang gi phyir zla ba nyi ma la sogs lha rnams 'byung ba dang bcas mtshan mo'i chal bcom ldan de yis zos zhes pa ste 'khor ba 'dir mtshan mo'i cha ni zla ba ste skyed pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir gang gi phyir zla ba nyi ma la sogs lha rnams 'byung ba dang bcas mtshan mo'i chal bcom ldan de yis zos zhes pa ste 'khor ba 'dir mtshan mo'i cha ni zla ba ste skyed pa'o //
translated: Here, because the moon, sun, and so forth are the gods, the night is destroyed by the BhagavƒÅn, who eats it. In this cyclic existence, the night is the moon, which gives birth.

original: nyin mo'i cha ni nyi ma ste sdud pa'o //
analyzed: nyin mo'i cha ni nyi ma ste sdud pa'o //
translated: The day is the sun, which gathers.

original: 'dir mtshan mo'i cha la ste skyed pa'i dus su kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid nges pa'i mngal du zla ba khu ba dang nyi ma rdul dang sogs pa'i sgras bshad pa dang gci ba dang 'byung ba dang bcas sa dang chu dang me dang rlung
analyzed: 'dir mtshan mo'i cha la ste skyed pa'i dus su kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid nges pa'i mngal du zla ba khu ba dang nyi ma rdul dang sogs pa'i sgras bshad pa dang gci ba dang 'byung ba dang bcas sa dang chu dang me dang rlung
translated: Here, at night, that is, at the time of generation, the characteristics of the consciousness of the ground of all are definitely in the womb. The moon, semen, and the sun, menstrual blood, and so on indicate feces, urine, and the elements earth, water, fire, and wind.

original: dang nam mkha'i khams dang bcas pa rnams rdul dang khu ba'i rten du gnas pa'i lus dang ngag dang sems rdzogs pa'i don du zos te /
analyzed: dang nam mkha'i khams dang bcas pa rnams rdul dang khu ba'i rten du gnas pa'i lus dang ngag dang sems rdzogs pa'i don du zos te /
